wbNaLNU8hfX3GgvP-ybf2Q.text: Love, Love, Love Egg Works!  We most often go to Egg Works on Eastern Ave. and have always had a great experience.  The orders are received quickly and the portions are huge.  For the price, it's an awesome bargain.  Egg Works has always exceeded our expectations.  The servers are always very pleasant, and more often, you can find a server with a great sense of humor.    Ya know what? They are so good... We're going to visit them today!  KUDOS to our favorite breakfast/brunch/lunch joint!!!  :)

UhivJjuo54X4PZ71Jvyz6w.text: Mahalo to the Egg Works staff!  I just wanted to say that this was the first time my family and I came to Egg Works. The service from the staff was EGGS-CELLENT! The atmosphere WELCOMING - shout out to PK! AND the food was DA BOMB! A special shout out to our waitress Manuela! Postive attitude and service with a smile :). This will be our new place to go for breakfast on the weekends.  Mahalo Nui Loa!

6N4--KpBix6goZEB3F-BxQ.text: I really liked dog friendly patio and the service was excellent!! Our waitress was very friendly and knowledgeable of all the food. We tried three different entrees and the food was so so. But their banana muffin was really excellent and I will come back again!!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. They have pet friendly patio which is very nice!!

vxP2XXXzfk8dZNPUkzYHaA.text: This place was delicious! I'd recommend it to anyone and everyone! The banana but muffin was delicious! My meal was to die for. I got the cinnamon raisin French toast. It came with turkey sausage and scrambled eggs. Everything was so good. I thoroughly enjoyed the food. The waitress was really nice and courteous too. Kuddos to her as well. I'll be back for mor fore sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Yummy Cinnamon Raisin French Toast! Ta die for!
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. DELICIOUS banana but muffin!

v81jkt1kurlnyaWaRcxInA.text: Why not 5 stars?  Everything was very good, 5 stars says as good as it gets, which would need be exceptional.  With that out of the way, let me say it's hard to beat this place for normal breakfast grub.  I ordered the corned beef hash and eggs skillet.  Christopher was working the counter, very quick, efficient, and just the right amount of friendly professionalism.  The corned beef was very good, shredded beef roast/brisket with potatoes and some spices thrown in to compliment the salted beef and the eggs were fresh.  Toast comes pre-buttered!  Which is great!  Normal jellies in the little single serve squares and the portions are large, enough for two in many cases.  The coffee comes with your own pot so you can have as much as you like and it's piping hot.   Don't expect gourmet, just very good, hearty food in large portions.  This place clearly has quite a few local regulars along with the tourists looking for something local.  I'll be back when I'm in the area.

95FTxPr5yiPyBNMe5vgOug.text: We stopped here on our way out of town for breakfast. It was decent, very large portions... Better to share I think. It was clean and the waitress was great. Overall a good experience and good price.

06XUajzkPjFuzvkQtTVwVA.text: This place always serves us great food and the service is wonderful! One time our food came out late and they constantly apologized and even gave us a nice discount.  They're always very polite.  The food is good! I've tried a or if things here and I have no complaints.  So glad this is close to home.  It has a nice homey feel.  I love how they offers a BOGO coupon in the LV Journal :)

XIc7NQouKY4T8S2xBmVh7g.text: Always amazing, flavors that tantalize your taste buds and melt in your mouth kinda food! The food seasoned so great there is no need to add salt, pepper or hot sauces! The gravy is the best, usually Im drowning my gravy in hot sauce at other places. Our server was Manny and he was amazing.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

3aiC3GmsdxHmpDchK4loqA.text: The banana muffins are the best.  The food was just ok. Friendly service. The place is cute and clean.

juUXMCZC5QiBF9awePugoQ.text: Me and my boyfriend love this place for breakfast! It's always delicious and never fails to satisfy his hunger for breakfast food. Even mine, even when I don't crave breakfast like he does.  The service and staff is always super friendly and my coffee cup is always filled and always asked before filling if I would like more.  I have only gone a few times but I know it's always a good choice.  I love their seasoning on the potatoes probably my favorite part. And the skillets are amazing since that's what I usually order.

c37PFMkey01SypOX7jFvbg.text: Came in with a group of 8, and we were promptly seated and taken care of. Orders were taken and our waitress Sara was really attentive. She took care of us in such a great manner, she was so sweet too. The banana muffins are amazing! We had pancakes and over easy eggs and honestly they were the best I've ever had at a restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

MZC8oqaytczd9vk-dAb_-Q.text: Really solid breakfast place.  Friendly service, good food, and reasonable prices.  Nothing crazy great, but I haven't found anything to complain about here.

bSGZH6fYL8In6a4IFkMakA.text: Came back here for another try. Got a bigger table and service was great. Our food looks and tastes delicious. Very friendly staff. I will be back again!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

UIC1tMJ6k1ZF8xeERv2etA.text: Wow where have I been pass this place everyday and always thought it just another breakfast joint...how wrong I was stopped for an early bird breakfast on Saturday and was pleasantly surprised the food was fantastic had a bacon avocado omelette, house potatoes were to die for coffee is hot and plentiful service fast and friendly. I'd say when you do something well don't change a thing. I will be back!!

IFyGibWnxUScfUzMVpTYGA.text: My experience at Eggworks was better than I expected. Arrived on a Saturday morning with friends with a very big appetite. Our server PK was an extraordinary server full of energy and brought all good vibes to the table. PK gave great suggestions to the food here and was very attentive to our table and other tables around us.   The food here is exceptional. I ordered the the works omelette. It definitely lives up to its name. Four eggs with ham, bacon, sausage, green bell peppers, mushroom, onions, tomatoes topped with loads of cheddar and jack cheese. With my omelette, I had a side of their potatoes and the banana nut muffin which was very delectable and moist.   Overall this place deserves 5 stars from me because not only is their food great but their service from PK made our first time experience here better!   Definitely recommend coming if you need a good breakfast spot in Henderson, Nevada.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. The Works Omelette

bdLlgcYGUH6kmvfDKNqDGA.text: The chicken, mushroom and spinach skillet over scrambled egg whites were phenomenal. Got a free banana nut muffin, too. Kids love their chocolate chip pancakes. Merissa our server was fantastic.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

ffOfqPv-rPOuDszlXyplyg.text: This was my first time at this location & WOW! Super impressed with the wait staff!! Gotta say my initial greeting at the door wasn't the best. I had walked up to the podium & there was a large party that got called in that came up from behind me who was seated. Then there was a couple behind me & the host went right to them & looked right by me. I had to speak up to him & tell him I was there to be seated. He then took me to be seated. Not sure what he thought I was doing while standing in front of the podium & hadn't walked in with the big party????? I was greeted maybe 10 minutes later by my waitress???? It seemed like forever but I was soooo hungry so who really knows....lol When our waitress came over she was very friendly & smiley. MANUELA was her name.  I placed my drink order & my breakfast while I waited for my friend to join me.  Soon after my friend showed up & Manuela came right back & got her order. Another waitress ended up bringing our food out. (Yes, both meals at the same time when I placed my before my friend did...not sure how that happened?) I was a little shocked with my entree because I thought it was a sandwich which it was but not your normal sandwich. I can't remember the name of it but it had a croissant on the bottom cooked in a pan with the ingredients on top & open with no top croissant. This waitress saw the look on my face & wasn't surprised since this has happened to other customers before. She knew what I wanted & went back & placed my order. Great team work!!! It was delicious but what was my favorite was your banana nut muffins!! OMG so soft, moist & served warm. I'm not a big fan of nuts in my breads or cookies but they were cut so small & it didn't ruin the muffin. I ended up with 3 & a loaf to go home with. It's better then the banana bread I make, I hate to admit this....lol If you want to try their banana nut muffin for free & it's your first visit there tell your waitress this! First visits & making it known gets you a free muffin & its sooooo worth it!!!  Restaurant was clean & a busy place which is always a good sign. Their bathrooms were nice too. Clean & kept well. They also have outside seating which I noticed when I left is doggie friendly. Place closes early @ 3pm but is open @ 6am. They also have other items on their newspaper like menu that don't' consist of just breakfast items. Definitely a place worth checking out, esp. this location. I've been to the one on Sunset & wasn't too impressed but I'd def. go back to this one & ask for MANUELA. Thanks for such friendly & fun service!!!

T9pHjUUSoBWyDyh4vF_IyA.text: Manny was so great, very nice server might be the best in town. The food is great and lots of it... Allen and I enjoyed this place and the service is wonderful. We will be back.

F35YzNqiyDdIIdNwwAyFlA.text: First time here for breakfasts, food was great, staff was awesome. They really know how to provide customer service. Definitely will be back for more.

bgPgO8HGmAm-hb0xFAC4dw.text: Fantastic service and even better brunch. Can be really busy especially on Sunday. A tad pricey.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

J1uf9QVG_v2xGz2nQhB8xw.text: Enjoyed a great breakfast, with wonderful service from Laura. Never felt rushed, the food was hot and delicious. Always enjoy our visits to Egg Works! Eggs Benedict and a Bloody Mary on Saturday Mornings hits the spot every time!

BrovSRdtN3RFL1fieu9F6Q.text: Yum!! Egg Works offers huge portions with great prices.  Plus they are so accommodating.  One of my favorites is the country fried steak skillet.  It's a skillet with a layer of potatoes, chopped country fried steak, country gravy, and eggs.  Also comes with toast.  Or if you have a sweet tooth like I do, the strawberry cream cheese french toast is a must try.  Really love that they offer a few alcoholic beverages.  Their Bloody Marys and Mimosas are delicious!   Service is always quick and friendly.  The food comes out so fast.  And if you don't see your server but need something, all you have to do is flip the egg on your table to yellow.  They really make it easy here!

mt0VTdiYsk6S_6cAQr7GJQ.text: Food was amazing,  but our Server Jason was phenomenal..... best service we've had in all of Las Vegas!

LLXWLgp3dJggWPG_Zd-dRA.text: This 5th location, even though brand spanking new is up & running like a well oiled machine.  Anticipate this to be the busiest one considering there aren't too many choices up in Anthem for a good breakfast joint.    Our party only had to wait for about 15 minutes...not bad considering the (beyond) full house.  My blackened prime rib benny was better than I've ever had it at any of their older locations.  Lightning fast service with a smile & all expectations were met.  The waitress even gave me one of their banana nut muffins...she said she didn't want me to feel left out.  I usually don't do muffins, but I ate every moist crumb on the plate.  The only negative was the line to pay heading out the door about 10 checks deep.  Not a deal breaker as everyone seemed fat & happy.  Nice to have one of these joints so close by!

wZRUOBJM4UwW3c7Q_RYTIg.text: Mario is the server you need, cordial, friendly, and fast.  My well done NY steak was perfect.  Corned beef hash was the best, according to my very picky husband. My son loved his stuffed French toast.   Superb.  Going to come here every time we are in Vegas.  It's a huge place so even though there was a lot of people waiting, we were seated pretty quickly.   Thank you all!!!

ORTJJTlV1jkzIOMg88p-Zw.text: Prime rib eggs benedict is delish! You'll need a while to review the menu there's so many good choices.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

mBm4VFXIQ5uwywwyxdlIIw.text: This Egg Works was a bit of a drive for my fiance and I, but I wanted to try it. We came at peak brunch hour on a Sunday and the place was packed. However, we were seated in 15 minutes. Our server, Paul, was very direct but very friendly. We used the check in on Yelp at the end of our meal and received our free muffin which looks amazing (too full to try it yet!). I had the Stuffed French Toast, which was surprisingly delicious. My fiance had the Blackened Prime Rib Benny, which didn't have as much prime rib as we expected, but he liked in none-the-less. I'm sure we'll be back again soon.

c1Gc3CaFmjlCvVZfH6TVgA.text: Brought our family and friends from out of town. Mario, our waiter, was very friendly, helpful, and fun. Made our experience fantastic, and the food was outstanding, as always! Great food, great times. Can't ask for better.

cSEBrDS5zX4Q8_0H68NX6g.text: Both my husband and I ordered the egg and cheese skillets. They were very yummy. PK was our server and was friendly and attentive. We'll definitely be back.

ktCH9UKzvCb_E1ONkgaskA.text: Awesome service and food !! PK is the best server hands down !!! fast , friendly , delicious place!! One of my favorite breakfast spots ! Love the banana nut muffin!! great omelettes too!!

e-11uV2TdoGSQ2lMm9G-gg.text: Giving this place a 5 star for service and the fact this is one of the few Egg Works that's not slammed busy, so service is prompt. PK was our server and it is nice to have a server who makes your morning great with a smile. I am vegan and was greatly pleased when PK was able to suggest the veggie scramble with tofu (yes, they have tofu!) The service was phenomenal from start to finish! I'd highly recommend asking for PK as he is quite the character that will set the tone for a great morning breakfast!

4jGCOYJ11DoxbCuYU6wbsw.text: Had a great breakfast,enjoyed the Western omelette,  Manuela the server  was fantastic, coffee cup stayed full. Dependable meal, consistently good!

TlBIS9jC2KDB0bb3muzF4A.text: Great service and omelets. Very happy to find this place. The waitress was very friendly and helpful. My girlfriend's meal was prepared incorrectly, but they remade it promptly. I will definitely return!!

-_ZnfA9TWdSaYMG6evBHiQ.text: Tried Egg Works on S Eastern after it opened. I found it easy to get into and reasonably priced. Location is great as well.   However the food just wasn't very inspired. I did not expect something special but the food was just pretty basic. Honestly I think you get more creativity at Ihop. I had the steak and eggs. A pretty simple breakfast dish and found the steak to be underseasoned and dull. Still waiting for that great off the strip breakfast restaurant. Maybe one day!

4LVm1WCWqK54Ex2J2UMNHQ.text: Pk is the best server! Attentive and brings the aloha spirit to the ninth island. The food was egg-cellent. We will be back!

zGpHoN1yE_rIhtd4Z37f9A.text: First time here and was immediately welcomed by the staff. Everyone's attentive, happy, and the food was delicious! Loved it.

SSGJA-b_beUW1WbK2bKu8Q.text: I love this place it is awesome! The service is always good and attentive, and the food is always amazing

VDsZznnxi1N6FJHhrmQQ9w.text: Food was great. Service was great except she forgot to bring my half and half. Very large portions.   This is a popular place based on the volume of guests there.  Unfortunately, I went to the restroom and a female employee used the facilities but did not wash her hands. Cane out of the stall and went right out the door

d3GucJ1-ImcFRtIUlKeaUA.text: Very good breakfast food (not in love with their lunch foods). My favorite menu item is the Spinach Benny without the Canadian bacon.  Their Poached eggs are done just right. HUGE portions and, if you're not a big eater, most things on the menu can be obtained as HALF orders. EggWorks' waitstaff are really on the ball - have never been disappointed by the service. If you prefer sweet dishes you won't be disappointed either.  For those of us who live in Anthem this is definitely the place for breakfast! I've been less impressed with their lunch menu. That said,  I always try to order the type of food a restaurant is known for - so, for example,  if I'm going to a steak house I don't order fish. In this case as its a breakfast place I don't order lunch foods.

GvyJhp0M480j50M8WSZl5g.text: This place is okay.  The food is good but a bit pricey.  The cheapest breakfast item is $8.75? Okay, they do give you a  muffin but still, just 2 eggs, potatos and bacon for that price? I get the same exact thing at COCO's for $4.99.  The homefries are really good though and they do give you a nice amount of them, so that is good!  The muffin ( a bran banana nut it seemed like) was not even that good.  If they eliminated the muffin maybe they can have a 5.99 breakfast item which would be better I think.  I spent over $12 for breakfast to go......... for breakfast and an OJ.  The staff was super friendly though.  Not sure who often I would return as spending almost $13 for breakfast for just me is a bit much.

rrfDdoL7gtJ4JeMwm4xDmg.text: Service was great Tina was an excellent server. She made it a priority to make sure our food was exactly the way we wanted it. She knew it was our first time so she shared with us a lot of the favorite items on the menu she was very kind attentive and made our visit extremely relaxing and enjoyable. Food was great atmosphere great. Thanks Tina since we now live down the street we will be back often

qs1yme0tRRayEe-AnPpN5w.text: This was my first time here and let me start off by saying you better get your reading glasses ready because the menu is HUGE! We ended up getting the chili reliano omelette which was recommended to us by our server, the works skillet and the waffle works for my 2 kids to share. Everything was good, nothing especially spectacular but exactly what you would think your ordering.  The banana nut muffins were really moist.

PEvJN3SvlJ2bcLPN3AGsVw.text: A wonderful experience! I used to eat at the one on Rainbow but since moving into the Anthem neighborhood I was happy too see an Egg Works close by (perfect!) I decided to sit at the counter and was greeted by Tina, who kindly introduced herself and made me feel like I was a regular there. Her attitude and personality are truly exceptional and her knowledge of the menu helped me discover a few things I didn't notice before. I could also see how other people eating were being helped out just as well as I was by her. I'm very happy I came in when I did, the food was great and Tina brightened my day and invited me back, so of coarse I will be back soon! Thank you Tina!

I have yet to wait longer than 20 minutes to be seated and if you're with a small party, they have a bar option that is first come first serve. I highly recommend the banana French toast!   Also shout out to our server Tina for taking care of us today!

The patio is nice; you can bring your dogs. Pleasant service. Would definitely recommend. My brother eats the breakfast burrito, every time!

VWlJ2ZEl4FqxOT9rlkcQnA.text: I've been coming here for yrs the price is right and the muffin is a must have!!! Tina at the bar is a sweet heart!

PYxprAKoQbMVKqnT8N2rqw.text: Great customer  services  from Robin. Will come again. Had the French  toast  and the country  fried  chicken  steak,

mX1zC6G34TO6IPbmurZZAQ.text: I just moved to Nevada and I've been trying to find a good breakfast place to eat. The service was amazing. Our waitress was Laura. The food was fresh and even the modifications that I made for my breakfast plate came out perfect. The one thing that makes me thrilled and amazed about this place is that there was something that was off about my mothers plate but we did not complain. But even so, the server (Laura)and manager, Heather, noticed and came and apologized and fixed the issue for us without ever telling them. Nothing but good people work there.

apXzto1TJg-zm_F5ztICIQ.text: Been here once before on our last visit. Liked it enough to come back again. Food was great. Servings were huge. Tina, our server, was excellent. She made sure our food was just to our liking. Highly recommend visiting.

nLDXmqDJ52ubat3HcDD7Tg.text: This place has huge portions and very friendly service!  My mom and I came here the morning we moved into our new home in Vegas. We wanted something filling and delicious that would last us most of the day and this ended up being the perfect place! We shared an omelet. It came with the possibility of potatoes or fruit. When I looked really torn between the two, our waiter offered to do half and half so we could have a little of each!   Also, they gave both my mom and me the check-in offer. We took of banana bread with us to for the guys back home who'd be doing all the real heavy lifting.   I look forward to returning sometime soon and trying one of their sweeter options!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Bacon Avocado Omelette with wheat toast and a side of half potatoes and half fruit.

41GwsjaVfyEmCSxkFf0vEQ.text: Crowded but no wait. Service was efficient and the food was very good. Many interesting breakfast items. I can see why this place is so crowded all the time. I will have to revisit many times to try all their different menu items.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Huevos Rancheros was awesome

XwDRNPop_nnTyMzM5ZAAxg.text: Eggs works is my go-to breakfast spot! Server Manny has excellent service and was pleasant to have. I come here for the loco moco w/ sticky white rice

6kauFB7E699wdVzSaD-lsA.text: Always my favorite spot for breakfast.  Food is always delicious and service is great!

tvHmemCBp-3zMwtfdhEreQ.text: The service was phenomenal our host, katelyn was our server and she did a great job! Plus she was really cute.

I5oAdE1MrSCoFydn7_K02g.text: Service was terrible, server took order didn't see her again until she brought the bill. One person in party their toast wasn't toasted, couldn't get anyone's attention, my toast was cold & stiff. I won't return.

C3Fdprqi-r3iDrztiDSAbQ.text: Huge portions , good price but no real flavors. Either to spicy or to bland and they throw a cheap maple syrup on the side.  No healthy breakfast options , no vegetarians or vegans options neither.  We will not return

jIX3wC3LDWQFHMQ4YgzbSg.text: Tina our waitress was one of the best I've ever encountered. Please keep her around so next time I come she's there.

mQIlVGJ6LUUdnUxxn_-DNw.text: We found this place purely on the reviews and the reviews held True during our visit!! Vanessa was our server and she was such a delight and made our visit enjoyable. She was informative on all our questions and prompt in expecting what we needed during our visit. She brought out a banana nut muffin right away once she found out it was our first time, delicious is an understatement of how good this muffin actually was. I tried one of their bloody Mary's and now I can say I may have found my favorite Bloody Mary location :) My Fiance and I both had a skillet and they were so full of flavor, we really enjoyed our meals. I highly recommend this place next time you're looking for a good spot to eat!

IIw7hi_k2oxDTRZHVZLnEg.text: Tina was our server and she was FANTASTIC! Best service I've had in a long time. Thank you Tina for making our Sunday morning brunch so pleasant with your hospitality, smiles and warm hearted energy.

a17f1yGRl6ZT9NrKFCCpVg.text: Place is perfect for breakfast 6am-3 banana nut muffins are to die for great quantities and a better atmosphere and Tina was by far the best waitress I ever had in my life

8jqSwIcpQKWZNoNhLnMSTw.text: My wife and I are new in town and dropped our dog off across the street. As we pulled out of the shipping center I saw the Egg Works sign. Before I could look at the whole building, I noticed people walking in with their dogs!!! We decided to give them a try. Before we could take in all the great smell of food, there were multiple host happy and eager to seat us.   Joshua was helpful from the start. I ordered the mash potatoe omelette and with seasoned potatoes and I was not disappointed. After 2 bites I knew, I had found my new favorite breakfast spot! We will be back for sure!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Mash omelet was amazing!

Mg1dXeN9YKKYelnYThONLg.text: EGGstatic there's a new breakfast joint that just opened up here in the Anthem area in the strip mall along Eastern between Horizon Ridge and Sunridge Heights.  I just did a quick glance of the menu but wasn't feeling any of their omelette selections till the  breakfast Hawaiian style section caught my eye! They offered 3 different meals; Spam or Portuguese Sausage with rice and eggs, Loco Moco( eggs, rice burger patty topped w/brown gravy)  and the Haole Moco (Westernized version with country gravy)  I went for the Haole one!   It was made right with rice on the bottom, layered with the burger patty and topped with gravy and 2 eggs.  I  just I didn't like the burger patty as much. I also thought more gravy is needed because the rice soaked it all up before I could finish it.  Otherwise not too bad.  Afterthoughts:  I should've ordered something on the lighter side.   The place is plenty big, bright and airy.  There is seating outside facing the busy street. Or you can sit at the counter or seat yourself in their large dining area.  The windows facing west has a nice view of the Anthem area.   Minor hiccups on service.  I seated myself (per sign at entry) and waited a few minutes till someone realized I wasn't being waited on yet. A server approached my table when she realized I wasn't helped yet and apologized for me being the only one there at the time and the 12 of them not tending to my table yet. Maybe because everyone is still green or it was still too early in the day, who knows.  I don't mind that they give you the check right away and you pay at the counter at your convenience but it is a pain and I do think the "flip to yellow egg" for help/service system is pretty lame.  I like that this place opens pretty early and they offer different choices for breakfast and brunch time and look forward to trying more food from their menu, but I have to say I still prefer the breakfast bakery cafe that has that savory waffle sandwich and Chopped Kale salad across the way.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. When you need service this is the way it&#39;s done here.. flip the card to a yellow egg.
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Loco Moco ..Haole version w/country gravy

lK77ynFciDEG2OQM30GllQ.text: This place is the absolute best and has amazing service! If you haven't been here you don't know what your missing. You must give it a try!!! Thank you guys for the excellent food and great menu options. You guys rock

OCG806oU3fqj5vjTfaihtQ.text: Fast and welcoming as always. Tina helped us out, and made our experience exceptional! Food was amazing and the service was nice.

hWjsg6T8GCby5-Eje-VzpA.text: Go see Jennifer one of the Best server you will ever have . Huge smile , great suggestions and quick service. Best breakfast ever...

yviC82heFNPrPRW7jPYOZw.text: My family eats breakfast here almost every Saturday. If I'm lucky to wake up, I get to join them.   I'd have to say the food is your typical breakfast. Omelettes, skillets, pancakes, French Toast, eggs any way you want. I love that you can order half-orders of skillets or just one pancake instead of a regular short stack. They have salads, sandwiches, and some lunch items. Check the specials board on your way in, they have a couple creative ones. What food stands out the most is their fresh made banana muffins. Served warm and so delicious! They come with most entrees, so if you choose toast instead, you are missing out! Egg Works are very family-friendly and prices are very reasonable.   Having frequented the other locations, I'd have to say this review is for the exceptional service we get here. We've had many servers and all of them have taken good care of us.  I can't lie and say that service has been top notch every time. Food has come out slower than anticipated. Orders have been messed up. However, they warrant a 5-star review because they always did a great job recovering as fast as they could. Servers were always friendly and attentive. I notice they show a lot of teamwork, especially since they have the system where when you need anything, you turn that handy-dandy egg over to signify service is being requested. No matter who our server is, the other staff are always open to lend a hand refilling coffee, delivering food, and cleaning up.   So we'll keep going for our ritual Saturday breakfast, for the service, the smiles... oh, and those yummy addicting banana muffins!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. 6/20/15 - Always yummy. Even more so when it&#39;s free w/ Yelp check-in!
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Served warm...
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Banana muffin

0J2tGYUYXOmCEZSsfnXh_Q.text: Great breakfast that's affordable. The wait time for seating and service was prompt. The corn beef hash was delicious. The waitress was super nice and attentive. They had the best banana muffin that you could ever have to eat. I will definitely return the next time I'm in Vegas.

6ltwWksInwz6KPqN2Wb7Aw.text: My daughter and I ate breakfast here Thursday. What a wonderful experience we had, too. Were seated immediately and I had coffee and she ordered a Diet Coke. Split their special of the day which was a chili rellano omelet which we opted for the deviously seasoned potatoes and super moist banana muffin. Huge portions, we split and still left food. Looking forward to future visits not only to your city but this delightful breakfast resturant.

x-zvbpkhCG4fTtBFsvbLNg.text: Awesome place for breakfast. Be prepared to be hungry, their portions are big.  Staff is also great.

JH8HRleBzzl3qY3HZDvw2Q.text: It was my first time here, and oh my goodness I loved it! I ordered the waffle with whip cream and fruits, and it was just delicious! The waffle itself was sweet, so it went well with the whip cream and the seasonal fruits. (Strawberries are my favorite)   We also ordered the Cajun cut potatoes (That is not what it's called, but they are those little cut potatoes that are seasoned with Cajun!) and they were very good. It kind of got salty at the bottom, but the potatoes were crispy and the Cajun mixed so well with them.   Our server Evan was so friendly and was always on top of things. They have a great staff! The one thing that bothered me was that we were seated in a small table, right in the middle of the floor, and it barely fit our plates and drinks on there, when there were other tables open. We ordered ice coffee so we had the coffee jug, the milk plate, our cups and our food plates on a teeny tiny table. I thought I was going to knock a plate over. Also since it was in the middle, my hat kept falling off the table because people would be walking by our table every 2 seconds.   Other than that I had a great time and I will be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Waffle topped with whip cream and seasonal fruits (I got Strawberry)

6kbfDr7FzKtB5viZIWMtoA.text: What a wonderful choice for breakfast!  Today we enjoyed breakfast on the patio.  Great tasting food, reasonable pricing and cheerful employees.  PK took care of us and meet all our needs.

uoFWOaafLnjwLMxeWzlg-Q.text: My wife and I just ate breakfast here. The food, service, and environment was fantastic. Our waiter (Manny) was very efficient and very polite. He made our visit very pleasant. Thank you and keep up the good work.

Czyk61MvWEbNCYrMxHgKSw.text: My wife and I had a wonderful breakfast here.  Service was great and food was excellent.

MwBr1rfEaV8dWHgoQBB36g.text: This is a very good breakfast spot, the food is good reasonably priced and our server today, Nicole was great. Nicole was very attentive and super polite. Highly recommend and will be back.

weSkeUFXT0V8wLgwGWbWQw.text: Rob is an exceptional server!   Provides the perfect touch of service, personality and professionalism. Food is always good and very consistent.

njNvd_YG47x8NmEGjNUPFg.text: Arrived on a Sunday around 11:30 AM with a party of six and waited about 25 minutes. Ordered their traditional Benny which was really creamy and we also ordered their home made corn beef hash that came with a banana nut muffin that was so moist and yummy! Love coming here for super cheap breakfast when we're in Vegas! Has never disappointed and we leave super full!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Traditional Benny
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Yum!

6XBWY3acF8I9wj-AkymxNQ.text: Love this place! Especially our waitress! Ask for LuAnna every time! She always makes sure everything is perfect! Even special requests for our kids! Great food, great family atmosphere, and great service!

nuf0UJJsI2PskTAUljtqWw.text: Excellent place to eat for breakfast, the omelettes are outstanding and even if it is packed with people you hardly ever wait to be seated. Service is usually good but when I was there for breakfast today I ordered not my usual but wanted to try some blueberry pancakes... I are maybe a quarter of them until I couldn't take it anymore.. no taste what so ever and we're a "heavy" pancake, no amount of coffee or milk could help me choke these down... from now on I will stick with the omelette

ZXf3bMeijrKc5e06grEv7Q.text: my best friend and I tried this place after hearing so much about it. wound up being a typical American style breakfast house with decent food. he ordered a chicken and spinach skillet that was ok at best. there really wasn't too much spinach in the skillet however and the cheese overflowed the top which wasn't pleasant. I had a Denver omelet that I wanted mushrooms in, but wound up coming without...   overall, I give this place three stars because, despite our not-so-good server, the manager was extremely hospitable and friendly. being in the industry, my best friend and I don't really ask for much when it comes to dining out because of our own personal experiences with difficult guests, but the server totally forgot our add-ons to the food, lacked attention to see if anything was ok, and pretty much came to drop the check and asked if everything was good when the meal was done. the least he could have done, was apologize for forgetting things, but due to his lack of attention the experience was kind of droll. food was ok. but, I doubt we will be recommending this place overall. the manager's name is jasmine I believe. great job miss! you are super sweet and because of you alone, we might give this place another chance in the far future.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. chicken &amp; spinach skillet &amp; Denver omelet

U--UhNoHlrNvfUSQBIu4xw.text: food is great here, I personally never get a chance you eat inside the place and wouldn't want to. each time I come and get a to go order the employees are rude and impatencant they treat you like a to go order is an issue instead of another purchase  to Thier store. they make u sit on these two chairs that have wheel chairs and walkers piled up and no one stops for a second to see if your help.... the one dark haired lady last time pushed thru me like I wasn't standing there and didn't even say excuse me or sorry when she realized what she did... I said something to two other people and they ignored me like I wasn't talking.... I will never go in this location again sadly because the food is good.

ehRWEgiUQ1DTJo6qxbtk1Q.text: So we all know about the food at the Egg Works nothing additional to add, always top notch and this visit was no different. Exactly what we've come to expect, except for one thing. The service was extraordinary! If I could leave 10stars I would.  Manuela far exceeded any expectations that we had. Her bright smile and bubbly personality only added to an exceptional experience.   Manuela thank you for all you do.

dDM8leVTT_T6OC9bDTmSSg.text: This is our go to place when going to Vegas! They have the most ahhhhmazing omelet, pancakes, homemade corned beef, and of course they have Hawaiian combos. PK our super sweet server anticipated all of our needs. He's the best....always ask for home!

zrEKHJ-Me6P2IkA_eg2n_A.text: They had me at banana nut muffin!!! I go there just for the muffin lol. The service has always been wonderful. The food is great also with just one recommendation if they could lay off the salt. . My favorite is the breakfast Berger yumm.....

9OO_VVaQigvzYuZe0dSoZQ.text: Always fresh hot food!   Pancakes always hot and fluffy.  Today I tried the chicken salad sandwich.   Excellent!  This is no frills neighborhood breakfast/lunch restaurant. We like it for that reason.  Would like to see regular hash browns but the seasoned potatoes r a nice change.

q7sb6kTVoEEfmKepvpBW6Q.text: Ethan was our sever and he was very nice. His service and attitude was on point. Always love coming to egg works for brunch

QHYM9dquJ9JOu8_qz_1jLg.text: This place was so great. Nikki was such a great waitress and the food was outstanding

0NL1p0TdIushnbsS5D90Xg.text: Always great food and great service! They give you an entire carafe of coffee which is so great because you are in control of heating your own cup! There is a fantastic menu and we have never had anything that wasn't great! We eat here at least 3 times a month and have never been disappointed! Keep up the great work!

XX2QWUbDxejh5jIXpQRg5Q.text: We love this place! HUGE portions. YUMMY! Exceptional service. We really enjoyed our visit today. Seats at the counter and really appreciated out service from Sayra.

N6x3_WMzCRpsSo-QULBYHA.text: Eggs were very plain and tasted like they came out of a carton. The potatoes were too salty and tasted like they came out of a freezer bag. The portions were huge though. The orange juice was cheap tasting and not freshly squeezed. The food reminded me of cafeteria food. The staff were very friendly and the room was nicely decorated. It was very busy so many do like it but not a place I will visit again.

U-7MtqmkSFRVwxoH6Pd4oQ.text: When in need of a great breakfast place look no further! The prices are great and the food is tasty. Most meals come with a banana muffin which are the best!!! Also their bloody Mary's are the best in town in my opinion. They make the mix in house and I've honestly never had a tastier Bloody Mary. I usually eat one of their many omelette a which are pretty big and they come with potatoes!

Mr4DvhZJQh0koH4kfcyZBg.text: Decent food for good price, banana nut muffins are amazing. They usually forget to put something in your to go orders. Good amount of food, most main dishes are between 8-13$

MwUdJRrsCQRFEXW3BxD_XQ.text: Great spot for breakfast. Our server PK is the best. Always fast and friendly, good food and great mimosas.

enMed3qUIWQAMCfPO1p2JA.text: Love going to Egg Works.  The food is delicious, especially since they have the Loco Moco and Portuguese Sausage Eggs and Rice.  I, also, love the hamburgers.  The main reason for coming back to Egg Works is the service.  Reina is one of the most friendliest and fastest servers.  I want to personally thank her for her service.  We'll definitely come back.

hVLOZ7cpZrA1pxJOEeXdHg.text: Went to another location on sunset and eastern and the food was great with no problems. The staff was fast and efficient even though the restaurant was crowded. The only complaint was that we had a gift card and even though our total was less than the amount, they wouldn't allow the tip to be used by the remaining balance. What should have been a completely free meal ended up costing us $5. Not a huge issue but worth mentioning so people don't assume a gift card can be used for everything. Otherwise great experience!

B0X2cHHBLMkS13-1Z3LVmA.text: Awesome lil place for some breakfast. The menu is jam packed with all types of flavors please every hungry appetite. Rob was an excellent server and we couldn't be more pleased with food and service.

B-3MueDT-HNS4Ij7-GdwQg.text: The food is off the chain the banana nut muffin is great.. I normally order the sunrise which is a croissant with eggs, turkey sausage, pepper jack cheese w potatoes AWESOME

u_l8PdQ0G1qbCY87Y4kgSQ.text: Love this location! Food is always great but service is exceptional! Our server PK always remembers us and gives us a big Aloha welcoming. He is so entertaining we always leave with a full stomach and an aching belly from laughing. Can't wait to come back for another fun dining experience with PK!

N2L9wnz1ecTxG25jd5MHhw.text: PK was our server. All I can say is he was the best.  Very personable, attentive and friendly.  The food was great (got have the banana muffin) the service super.  Thanks so much PK.  Aloha!!!!

FDwsx0QKmhpdP3f8YaljQg.text: This place reminds me of the homemade breakfast that my mom made me when I was a kid but even better. Their hash browns are amazing and the banana bread alone will make you want to come back. Ask for Randi to be your server because not only is she a great server but she is one of coolest people I've met out here in Las Vegas.

Zz8T1rfOd4Yz7vguqHagtg.text: Gotta say, breakfast places are usually hit or miss, but Egg Works is definitely on point. The food, the service, the never-ending crowds. Ok, the crowds are not a plus at all. It's crazy on the weekends unless you want to wake up at grandparent times.  Regardless of the crowds, they manage them well.  The food and service are just always great. Whatever they are doing behind the scenes, they are doing it right. Great job.

KmZaHAnoMDW9U4baXkjGuw.text: My absolute favorite breakfast restaurant EVER! I'm from Vegas but I moved to California where there was no Egg Works. Now I look forward to coming back to Vegas to eat here! My favorite go-to dish is the "Grandma's Biscuts and Gravy". Their Banana-Nut Muffins are to die for, everyone is very friendly (especially Vanessa!) and the atmosphere is so warm and welcoming. Can't wait to return!!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. satisfied egg :)

undbHDj6HMgwtm7Bmpjr7w.text: The BEST banana bread in town, at any location.  I love Egg Works!  The portions are big, you better be hungry. But it's all good. So good.

AnkYJiiSJHShua0eJTDzDg.text: Not going back. I had breakfast at the counter during a slow time this week. The empty seat next to me was dirty with crumbs and used glassware. I gave my order, received my food and ate, and yet never was the seat next to me cleaned or wiped down. The two buspersons I noticed working there were busy (a Latin gentleman and young lady), but lots of servers and runners were standing around scratching their arses. I could hear the bull session in the kitchen from my counter seat.   Also maddening at EW is that management makes their staff marry their ketchups, which is common practice though still a health code violation, and foremost disgusting. Marrying ketchups means that contents from half empty bottles are combined. This practice saves restaurants money but the downside is that expired ketchup can live on in perpetuity. I knew this to be the case because when I squeezed some ketchup onto my plate, feculent bubbling ketchup water emerged.   The last thing that bothers me about EW is that they don't allow the servers to be cashiers, and often the line is 10-15 minutes to pay when they're busy. EW doesn't trust the servers to be cashiers for fear they'll flip checks and bilk pocket cash tables. Rather hypocritical given that management has no issue exposing EW customers to various foodborne illnesses via the ketchup scam. "How was your meal?" "Fine except for ketchup trauma and the year of my life I lost waiting to pay the bill"  PS: The last negative Yelp review I posted for EW was deleted. I guess they're messing with more than just the ketchup.

w3rqsG4FpU5BdQnzKpZBNg.text: My favorite thing is the banana nut muffin. So yummy and warm when they bring it to you.  The last time I was there the waiter forgot about our muffins. However when I asked him he had no problem putting someone in a container to got.

nMgZJFex455XC6pZ7YoG4A.text: Big servings had the has and egg whites. The hash was kind of cardboard tasting. Not thrilled with it. Others at our table had eggs Benedict the hollandaise sauce was just ok. 4 stars for the service it was great

egsNiWZntn_6si-WpEtoGA.text: We frequent Egg Works all the time! Always a great experience with quality food and friendliness! On weekends the wait can run long so we always grab a seat outside or at the bar. The patio is dog friendly also!

aONVXs5QtuhxaSpoOLBNTw.text: If I could write a review and give 0 stars, I would. We just moved to this side of town and we were beyond happy that we were still close to an EggWorks. (We use to frequent Sunset/Eastern)  We went for Sunday "brunch". My daughter ordered the Mouse Pancake and as a lover of blueberries ordered some on the side.  Our orders came out, we were starving. My daughter ate a blueberry out of the bowl they had given her, and it was then that we noticed the MOLD all over the blueberries, and upon further inspection, the blueberries underneath were mush and shriveled.  I alerted my server who took them into the back and asked if we wanted a different kind of fruit, I did not. At this point I was so appalled by what had happened I just wanted my family to eat and leave. It took 15minutes for what I am assuming was a manager to come to our table and apologize. They then stated they took the blueberries off our bill (a whole $1.75) and again asked if I wanted a different kind of fruit. They then let me know that they threw all the blueberries out and would order new. 5 mins later our server brought out a loaf of banana bread that was "on the house". We got our check and as we prepared to leave, to my horror, I saw a server bringing out 2 plates stacked with blueberry pancakes. I will NEVER be back. In what universe does a free loaf of banana bread fix the fact that you tried to serve my child MOLDY FRUIT??! Her absolute favorite thing is fresh blueberries. She wouldn't even taste her pancake because they had put a "face" of blueberries on that as well. $40 spent for the worst breakfast experience I have ever had. I'm sure Brad Burdsall wouldn't be okay with any of this.

R_0B8XUdUTUOHzSPG7rEcg.text: Great place great customer service! Took the family out and was relieved that this place was clean and professional! I recommend the Cabo Breakfast Burrito!

WRfz6L1xaViBMcUnSe2BPw.text: Great food and service I love the eggs Benedict's myself. Good spot for breakfast. Probably my favorite breakfast place in Vegas

dyhdA_naqEH6bD596tTVcA.text: We called ahead and they added us to the wait list. Add a star for this alone! We get there and realize we needed to be someplace so we needed to eat quickly. Waitress said no problem! Another star! She quickly walked us through the menu, ordered our food and the food was out in 10 minutes. Third star! And two more stars because the food was spot on delicious, huge portion sizes and didn't taste greasy at all. Will definitely be back and will try more of a variety of dishes. The stuffed French toast was delicious and super hearty. The fresh baked banana nut muffin was moist and warm. Breakfast burrito was huge and delicious.

ilH5LTRmRiyhUhLqoxLEIA.text: Great food and family friendly  place.  Service is quick and efficient. The "flip the egg" is genious. No more flagging your server over. Flip the egg. The breakfast potatoes are excellent.

495S0SXAHLsH6IxHUubArg.text: First time there. The food was decent, but my husband and I didn't care for the breakfast potatoes. They're small diced potatoes that are deep fried and heavily seasoned with a dry spice mix (you can brush it off with your fingers). My husband (who will eat literally anything) didn't like the flavor of the spices, I was okay with it but not exciting. There were NO other potato options! Not even hash browns. You need options! And while the biscuits and gravy looked and tasted good, there wasn't nearly enough gravy for the dense biscuits provided. We'd go back if they had other potato options.

7XW_5pfJVwTMNlX98M9C_g.text: This place is ALWAYS busy and with good reason! The food is always quick and delicious- lots to choose from.  Today Tina was our waitress and was not only friendly and quick but thoughtful about the items she served. My friend and I shared a dish and Tina thought ahead to be sure we had extra items needed for the meal to be "complete" for both of us.

D0Ydi7lF1DGH-MXt71Rkzg.text: This is our breakfast spot.  The food is consistent and the service is solid.  The portions are big for the prices!

0Zf8Ms0fnF9Re_THr4mgIw.text: Very good breakfast. Waitress Vanessa did a great job. Very friendly. Eggworks is our favorite breakfast restaurant in Henderson. Good size portions unlike some other breakfast restaurants  in the area which my wife and I no longer frequent. Great job Eggworks. Keep it up!

76oxkdBtNF49qmnF9SlQuQ.text: I've been going to the Eastern Avenue Egg Works since the first opened. I've always gotten the Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs. I have been wanting to try something else but I gotta admit they have the BEST chicken fried steak I've ever had. But this time I cracked open the menu. My server was Vanessa and I must admit she's the most knowledgeable server I've had here. If you go here ask for Vanessa. I still got the chicken fried steak and eggs. Vanessa is super friendly and a great server.

5R-k1eUWcClZfx5dEi1SLQ.text: Egg works is literally my favorite breakfast spot! However I do believe they need more space and bigger tables. But I can tell you every time we went the service was great. Make sure if you have yelp to check in with them to get that amazing banana nut muffin!!

cYtMSahujUUZD9Ukv8GfuA.text: First time here, decent parking, place is quaint inside.  Got seated quickly and put our order in.  Food came fairly quickly.  My veggie skillet was fine, but the eggs Benny that was ordered wasn't.  Eggs were cold and the bread was soggy underneath.  Potatoes also weren't as ordered (wanted only light seasoning).  Server was good about it all.  Didn't wanna take a chance on having a repeat issue, so we put in for a half omelette instead.  Waited 15 minutes and nothing came, which is odd since it takes about two minutes to make.  Server eventually came back and apologized and said health department was there, so that's why it was taking longer, but we know that doesn't usually impact service to any great degree unless issues are present.  We decided we had enough at that point and asked for the bill and one of the managers came over and gave us the bill for the  skillet and a half hearted apology.  Server came back again and apologized further (she was really nice) and gave us a soft drink and muffins to go, since one of us didn't eat (which was nice of her to do).  So while the server was good, I'm not sure that's enough to get us to try this place again.  3 stars due to my skillet being ok and the server being good.

rHIMDXPXmZnoypdZv-mwaQ.text: The breakfasts are very good, tasty, great portions.  Sadly, the salads leave much to be desired. The only thing they have to do to improve them is to use fresh lettuce instead of the nasty bagged or pre-cut lettuce they use. The service was friendly and efficient.

_rpA1XfzPhGH45Kd9VIolQ.text: Ashley was amazing and her service was Phenomenal I would always recommend sitting in her section if possible

qLyBdiiKbsUQoGjk04M3NA.text: I saw the reviews and was like "hey,let's go check this place out" friends were in town so we brought them here. Place is easy to find, lots of parking and we went in the morning on Labor Day. No wait! Walked in and there is a cute train that goes around inside (loved it!) then awesome music since I love country, very cute atmosphere inside. Hostess and waiter was very nice as well with great attitude.   Food was not to die for me that is, I had the French toast. It was ok :( and my husband had a skillet (he loved it) and my friend had the banana bread French toast (she loved it) but her pouch egg was way too watery. Her husband had the mash potato omelet he also loved his food. So I will try it again but something else ;-)

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Skillet :)
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Regular French toast
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Mash potato omelet and bacon (crispy)

G5bmq6TaIuHPP8lMctMYfA.text: My go to breakfast spot when in the area. I almost always eat a banana nut muffin followed by a small 2 egg vegetable omelette with split potatoes / fruit , and coffee. All for 10.02 inc.tax a few years ago it was under 8.00, still cheap. I can never finish either. Everyone always gets gets the regular size portion, which is huge. It's just a waste. They have perfectly seasoned potatoes, good muffins.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

4zOWePOjmWlJvEHOXAENEw.text: I ate at egg works a few months ago in hopes of it living up to its stellar reviews. The staff was extremely friendly and there was nothing particularly wrong with cleanliness or service. The food was just subpar, and I don't understand the hype. I'd be open to going again but I truly hope I have a better tasting plate of food.

j0lICbcsWn0XvtCwxx0UgA.text: My review goes to the sitting staff. Starting off by walking in and putting my name down to be called. We were told our wait time will be 15 mins. Which is an awesome wait time for such a busy restaurant. My name was called, Kat! Party of 3! We walked to the booth seeing that they had taken someone else by the name of Catalina and not Kat. Being swooped on our table for Catalina party of 2. Yes party of 2 was the first clue that the wrong person was called. They said that this has never happened and didn't know how you react to it. Best thing they should've done was go back to her table and apologize and say that it's Kat party of 3 that was called . Knowing her party had just gotten to the restaurant... Instead we waited for another 10mins for a table to be cleared while they called me Catalina to be seated.  The one star goes to being called another persons name.  The food review will come later..

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

fZxtHJBQCiN1WvtBYa37pA.text: Wow!  This place is awesome !  The people and the food are always on it, they are amazing !  The food is always wonderful, hot or cold as it should be, the portions are big and the thing that amazes me is the wait is never long at all.   You order and a few minutes later it's in front of you.  The scrambled eggs and patty sausage are so good!  I have never been disappointed there at all.

nt29GE3DaPiBvCpZBG6dPA.text: This is just a great place to eat with reasonable prices on freshly made food. Gotta try their tuna melt , awesome....yummers ...

MPdeXTPlQNE1MwAadPhxbg.text: Wife and I went here on Father's Day. Had never been here before and got seated after just a few minutes. I noticed how the food portions were very generous, so we split our food choice. An egg scramble with seasoned potatoes. The food arrived in a timely manner...and heated perfectly. The oj was delicious and our server was personable and attentive.   We will definitely be back !!!

Nedbqzyr6vHLnBMfLnJrog.text: Amazing selection of breakfast dishes.  Large portions.  Banana muffins are delicious & moist.  I enjoyed the Hawaiian favorite with a side of biscuits & gravy to share.  Both dishes were flavorful & homemade tasting.  Could not finish the large portions but definitely look forward to going back to try another dish but know better not to over order.  You will not walk away hungry!!!!

IxgYUKfTo0CC3oCIfEHn4A.text: Love that they moved to this location which is much closer to me.  I usually sit at the bar and they are always quick.  The breakfast is always hot and simply delicious.  I have a lot of favorites and as I've said before the seasoned potatoes and fries are to die for yum!  I bought the seasoning salt also.  The staff is always friendly and hard workers.  My only complaint is that the hard boiled eggs come w/ the shell.  I never order that so its not a big deal, but when I do I hate taking the shell off myself.  Overall, I still give them 5 stars.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Awesome simple breakfast!  Large portion of my favorite seasoned potatoes amen!  I pour Cholula on it and eat them first.
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Excellent waffles &amp; turkey sausage.  My only complaint is by the time I took the shell off hard boiled eggs, my food was cold.

gWwtuHXlbFS1blwn7RKE_Q.text: The host of a restaurant makes a big impression on customers right when they walk in and today left a pretty bad impression on me. There was a gentleman who asked me for my info right away and then there was a young man seating people named Tyler. Tyler had two people walk in that he knows and immediately asked them if they wanted to sit outside to get seated quickly. My fiance, my daughter (in a stroller) and I were also waiting to be seated outside. My fiance stood up and asked him to make sure he still had us on the list and he said, yes. Then, he welcomed his friends again as if he didn't know who they were. It's one thing to wait because of business, I understand that. But watching the host try to seat the people he knows first is a little degrading.

t6UpVNmdsoJJyoiw8_4XPg.text: Just as the rating states, this place is A-OK.   This place is super packed on weekends, so plan accordingly and be prepared to wait. I suggest going BEFORE you are hungry, because you'll definitely have an appetite by the time your table is ready.  Luckily, there isn't usually a wait to sit at the counter, so that's what my boyfriend and I did when we went on a Saturday morning.  Why only 3 stars? Some of you may hate me for saying this - but it's because of their lack of decent hashbrowns. They have potatoes, and although they are tasty, it's not what I like. They do offer a hashbrown option, but they look like what you get from McDonald's and not the shredded potatoes I prefer. Additionally, I like my eggs runny, and I ordered them over easy. They came out over hard with no yolk at all and that is quite disappointing.  I ordered the CFS and it was very tasty. My boyfriend had an omelette with basically the kitchen sink in it and he loved it.  Overall, the service was fast and friendly and I will definitely go back - hopefully on a day when I can try their blood mary mix or a michelada!

M1j8Q9hc_iibPEzuK8IcIw.text: Easy 5 stars for our server Nicki. Very friendly, efficient and informative. She appears to enjoy having a little fun conversation with customers while providing great service.   My partner and I have tried several breakfast spots in this general southeast side of Vegas over the past few months. Most have been fairly average. With just one visit Egg Works became my favorite. It has a very Hawaiian feel which I love, that's the food and the Aloha.   The food and preparation are very high quality. I had the Stuffed French Toast sandwich and loved it. Just so much food though. Very filling. Next time I will order a 1/2 order which I understand is available with quite a few items on the menu. Perfect!!  The Banana Bread Muffin is one of the best I've had. I don't say that lightly, my partner and I have sampled much Banana Bread (and Shave Ice) when visiting Hawaii. It definitely instantly reminded me of Julia's on Maui.   They have a huge menu and I'm really looking forward to sampling more on my next visit.  Aloha and Mahalo to Nicki and Egg Works

PnH48hde6hVwYHt7B9ADFw.text: I recommend trying the Chili Mac. It's the only place in the area that seems to have it. I get with their Works Chili.

8oAl52tUB8x7xBVtRYZM7g.text: HIGHLY recommend. The staff is very friendly, educated on the menu and attentive. The restaurant is very clean, impressive that as busy as it gets it doesn't get too loud. Wait time and price is reasonable. Plenty of parking. We love the food no matter what you order. The coffee and homemade bread are Devine! We love sitting on the patio with the misters. Love the coupons they provide. All around great place.

X0UhFLwFBNXbZC8AWmKzcA.text: Can't believe I forgot to leave a review at this place. First off if you're visiting Vegas and want a good breakfast come here.  There is all the traditional breakfast plus other specialty items; all at great prices. They also have 30 percent miltary discount!!!! I always come here while in Vega, trust me you don't be disappointed here.

SLewb_KYQ38d_0Q-UPUqAQ.text: Tina is Awesome!!!!!!!! Great service, great food clean and delicious!  We come several times a month and highly recommend them.  Ask for Tina!!!!

uqglMhC29GcuOHV9H23DzQ.text: Good food and an extensive menu. I've had good and mediocre service here. It is busy on a sunday morning and you will have a wait. But overall worth it. With the amount of business that they do, table touches from managers would be helpful so that they know when food is taking too long to get to tables

iV-nX5PMzpZ1zrz0WECu8A.text: In my opinion there are much better breakfast places. I find the Habla Diablo seasoned potatoes offered with most breakfasts to be too heavy on seasoning and very dry when all I want is some classic hash browns that I can season myself. Unfortunately that's not an option here. In addition, I ordered two eggs over easy and got what appeared to be poached eggs still dripping with water. If this is their version of over easy then my breakfast was even farther from the classic ones served at so many other places. So, with the above negatives and the fairly high prices I'm afraid I won't return soon.

bcwr9B1trikpnFmauUxaBw.text: Yuck.  My wife and I were both sick for 3 days after eating here, and we ordered different dishes.  It's pricey too, $35 breakfast for 2 breakfast entrees and 2 coffees.  I asked my waitress (who was very nice) how a couple items were and she kept saying she didn't know, had never tried anything-that should have been my clue to leave.  Patronize at your own risk; but you will be sorry:(

ATAiL0GwxmWjGOqAekRR1g.text: Best breakfast joint in Vegas. Had the traditional Eggs Benedict. Delicious as always. Ethan, our waiter, did an excellent job!! Will definitely ask for him again, the next time I come!

LxJv07MpwBaUFx2yoU5t8Q.text: my first time here and i will come back.  the first impression is always what will get the customer to come back or not.  shout out to p.k. our awesome islander waiter. *he thought i was from the island too lol  this guys is amazing, he had a smile on his face, cracking up jokes, making me feel comfortable and was right on the ball with his customer service. very friendly!  food: i ordered the island favorite with portugese sausage, eggs and rice with the banana nut muffin. *always get the muffin, it is the best and moist muffin ever.  i will come back again! good job eggworks!

TJGVZPY9dBv4oGyXHm-dQA.text: Our server was Laura. The food was bomb. I recommend the juevos rancheros with green sauce.

Hhy5RGmljLaOzoVp9o_kBA.text: It was late morning so by now everything was appetizing to me . The place was not really busy I ordered one of their  omelet everything was ok until they brought me the banana nut muffin my friend and I stared at each other in front of me was this muffin that looked like somebody bit a part of. I was going to keep quiet but I wanted bread with my omelette so I called the attention of the waiter i showed him the muffin and he started to give me a lecture on how the muffins get deformed when you take them out of the pan.Well it was my muffin and I'm eating it i want to make sure that no one has taken a bite off it for sanitary purposes . I would have been happy with I am sorry   I can get you another one.After the lecture I decided to just eat my my omelette without the muffin.My friend who was treating me couldn't believe it so he left a small tip.Im from the service industry also and i would have not served the muffin in the first place. Sorry I'm going back to the one in Sunset.

zSPXKQk0dy5K-KcTCrqRDQ.text: Everything was good, not great, including service and waiting, except the crepes. Free WIFI was great. In my opinion crepes are supposed to be really thin, but mine was thick. Just short of being pancake thickness. I asked if mine was a mistake, but waitress said that's how they all are. You can even see the egg it's made with.

jeSPJxhFOfjRIzvuXzykrA.text: Service was awesome but my food was not very good this time around... I was excited because I ate at another Vegas location and it was awesome but this time around was just ok..

9D9_yw2NZioXsHxRgvmC7w.text: We went here and it was very disappointing.  My HUSBAND had the vegetarian skillet and the veggies were cold with a very sad melted cheese on top. I ordered pancakes and Bisquick makes better tasting pancakes!!! I will never go there again and the sad thing is we live down the street.  Ugh never again!!!

gvVAGWp40G69-nAXz3R_Ww.text: The  meal was so so. Order  the  blackened  prim rib Benny , they  bring  it  chopped ....who does  that  to prime  rib.  And they  give  me  a  steak  knife . ...lol

YQwdOq8SE6BP2ymr9Aeckw.text: We came in for a late breakfast. I had a half  order of the works omelette with a side of fruit. . my buddy had full order of the stuffed french toast. Each with way too much food for a normal person. The omelette came with a banana muffins. It was very moist, boy was it good. The French toast was so large that if my friends have not eaten for a week he still wouldn't have been able to finish it. And it was delicious. There were two pieces of French toast with a scrambled egg in the middle. My omelette was just the right amount of food. It has a mixture of veggies and chicken with that melted cheese on top. Again absolutely delicious. I recommend coming in hungry and splitting the meal with someone else because otherwise it's way too much food. And the service couldn't be beat. The servers share a table so whenever you need something, you flip a little token on the table and a server comes over immediately and takes care of you need.

TYRAx6oqSKyv7trb9htK0w.text: Five of us went to lunch here.  They weren't very busy, yet it took quite a while for the food to come out.  I liked their fries and onion rings.  I ordered a club ranch wrap without tomatoes.  It was a lot of food but I didn't care much for the cheese or the ranch dressing, too runny and sour.  Two members of my party ordered the BLTs and we're happy.  The BLTs had a ton of bacon on them.  Another member of our party had the pancakes and we both thought they tasted more like KFC biscuits than pancakes.  Lastly, someone had the cheeseburger and they thought it was awful.  They said it tasted like they put chopped onions and oatmeal or some other type of filler in it.  They may serve up a mean egg breakfast, but I don't think I'll be going back to find out.

yxWY67Ite6dZyhBWmvu5sQ.text: Normally I only post positive reviews but I just couldn't pass on this. Our server Eathan deliberately over charged us on my son's meal. The amount he over charged was exactly his tip. He tried to take off the over charges and I said no. Then he wanted to take care of my whole bill and I still said no. I paid for meal and so did he. Horrible costumer service. I have many friend and family members that won't be to happy to hear about this. Good luck getting to Disneyland kid.

2z6s74e4p4Rx7ma3afiImQ.text: Manuela from Egg Works is one of the most attentive and caring waitresses I have ever had the privilege to meet.  And Egg Works has great, hearty food, excellent value and a relaxed environment - thanks for a great brunch.

UGCwwtMK6bFW6NiU6_32kA.text: Great food and not expensive. Muffins are the best!!! There went my diet !! Very friendly people too

IwS4cidURNLpM4IwU47pLw.text: The food is yummy and the menu is extensive. We would have been back based on that alone, but PK's awesome service sealed the deal. He is the real thing. Everything one would want in a server. He is super friendly, laid back and easy going, yet simultaneously 100% competent at his job, which makes for a really enjoyable dining experience. PK has even taken notice when we were in someone else's station and made sure we had everything we needed as soon as we needed it. He's a real team player. Thanks for making us always feel so at home, PK!

JBEtq9aSEx1NTenLcoqv0g.text: Our server PK or Paul is very friendly to us, he gave us extra banana nut muffin.. plus he gave insite about where to go here in Vegas,always accomodating and super nice. The food is good, plus you can get it in half size for a cheaper price. Find PK as your server you will leave with happy stomach and good conversation.

D7P0VVailRh4kZUPtunngA.text: We are just visiting from Southern California and wanted some good breakfast eats nearby Las Vegas. Having been around the strip all day the day before, we decided to head a different direction this time. Quick and friendly service along with huge portions and amazing banana nut muffins.  Oh man!!! Wife had the stuffed French toast and loved it( sweet and salty)! Mother in law had the Mexican crepe which was awesome with the salsa and sour cream on it. I could go on and on but no need. Stop reading and go try it for yourself. Ask for PK. He was our server and took great care of us. He is very friendly (but not annoying like some who try too hard)and my daughter wanted me to add that she loves him.

RmKiY3lJhQy6BekbjOFanw.text: Breakfast was great! I got the Veggie Bennie and a Bloody Mary! Yum yum! The service was great! Randi was our server and she was very pleasant I will be going back for sure and requesting her as our server! The Bloody Mary had the perfect amount of spice and the veggies Bennie was one of the best I've ever had. Thank you Randi such a wonderful experience!

wOXMarFbt-q9ui_dUBabkA.text: Great food, fun environment & best service by Laura G. AKA "LG"!!! Great experience!!!

tzPifSfOLCQDpTxfg2S-fg.text: Fantastic service and a vast array of tasty delights here! The Santa Cruz skillet is a favorite.  They have delicious signature banana muffins that come with all breakfast meals (almost all).  One of the few places in town that let's you substitute fruit instead of potatoes.  Also you can order half size orders if you don't want the humongous portions that they serve. The coffee is okay (I'm a snob though) but "okay" is better than the other crap they serve anywhere else. Plus you get your own thermos of it so you don't wait for refills.  PLUS they serve Cincinnati chili here. Pretty much can't go wrong with this choice!

5HXOg0VGK5ewGoJZouV3QA.text: I live this location of Egg Works. Been to them all including The Egg and I's, and this location has the best servers and good. The whole place is clean, including restrooms. They have quality food, seems a little fresher then most locations. The server PK is great. He is quick with his service and fun and easy to talk to. Trevor is another great sever/manager at this location. The daily changing food specials are also really good. I get a lot of different things but my old stand by is the mashed potato omelette. It's killer!!

CeglnTMyjhoPnQQt9rGhtQ.text: Egg Works is my favorite place to have breakfast when I'm visiting friends and family in Vegas. If you haven't been been to the S. Eastern location you are truly missing out! Ask to sit in Randi's section when you get there. She is awesome and always gives service with a smile.

gzvAsSvmyvvN4BQYxsOx6g.text: Pk was awesome! Definitely was a great experience today. He made my day that much better. Oh yeah, and the food was great. ;)

U3wKeR3XXeD8jcw6B7hFEw.text: Just absolutely love starting my day at Egg Works with friends or by myself. The service is always incredible. Today Manuela was my server and I couldn't have had a better experience.

xAUd2R5yIYEKU1eAyxqqGg.text: Busy memorial day and Reina held her own she gave great service in a super but super time I'm extreme happy

LK2xbGO92lcvs-KTvFmcFg.text: Ethan was an amazing server! Served our food quickly and he was very helpful with what good food to get from the menu. Great service over all! Def gonna come back again!

4PazN6REEZqYMbFzgYzhLA.text: Was so good the first time, we came back again. First time I had the loco moco. Not in the islands, but it was ono eats! Second time I had the veggie omelet, which was also great. Highly recommend! Thanks Heather for the great service.

emjKR3UA__YjE044DoOpJQ.text: It's been almost a year since receiving service from this location, but I wanted to give a shout out to Rochelle and Trevor for helping us out so much when our regular location (Sunset) was out of what we normally order (for the 2nd time in a row -- and both times on Saturdays!)  Great customer service, Trevor & Rochelle!

RuXO9tH9EpENp6vurMpizA.text: Service is great, food portions are good, very busy place.  The potatoes are good but sometimes it is over seasoned and quite salty on my last visit.  I like the staff.  This is one of my go to place for breakfast.  PK is great and provided very attentive service.  I am working down the menu trying to order different things.

VkPGVRL-GHQ8FzNZZTBaOw.text: Egg-cellent food and service! Our waitress, Dee, was so friendly and efficient. Chicken fried steak and the huevos ranchero omelet were yummy!

xRgwrsTg_7ZvSDHgioB_8A.text: Manuela was terrific as always... We love this placeGr8 food & service!  Food has varied menu for breakfast or lunch, always fresh and prepared to suit. I do recommend that you try it

zeqKR02qWKXDr0hS2TS5yw.text: I would like to start off by saying that the food was great. Our server a guy from Hawaii was so nice. I can't say that about the server next to me. Jenny. She was awful. I can not believe the way she talked to a guest. it was an elderly man, dining alone. Who I found out has been in the restaurant industry for 30 years. We were seated by the kitchen and I can hear her yelling at people. I know it was here because it stopped when she left and started when she went back. The worse part is that she may have been a manager since she had a different shirt on then everyone else. Which sucks because she probably won't even be held accountable.  I will be back but won't be seated in her station. I have been waiting tables for years and would never talk that way.

kp6OOZRAmHSmmWazRq2hdQ.text: Deanna always helps me at the counter on Sundays. She's very quick and gives great service. She always makes sure everything is going well and keeps the coffee filled. Sadly she is a Denver Broncos fan, however that is better than being a Seahawks fan. Go sit at the counter and ask for her, you won't regret it!

4iNDI2u2zhDyD9BZB2d_lg.text: Kris and I have been here several times now, and we've got nothing but great things to say about this place. This Egg Works in Henderson consistently has great food and outstanding service. There hasn't been an egg-dish yet that we haven't enjoyed, and the country potatoes are also crisp, full, and savory! A special shoutout to our server Jodi and her speedy service; here's hoping you make it to Disneyland!

_mDpL6Y1ieC2_D5e385ZTw.text: How this place has less than 5 stars is beyond me. Anyone leaving Las Vegas or the Henderson area should make it a point to go out of their way to stop here. The stuffed French toast, eggs Benedict, or anything else you can think of will be top notch. Not only is the food absolutely delicious, but the service is nothing short of amazing. I will be dropping here on my way out of town every single time I am close enough.

xJCAvsSB_CzY5ZWmaVzBFA.text: The food is great and service is excellent.   I love everything on the menu.  If you go there ask for PK.  He always greets us with a smile and welcomes us like family.

JwdS_6PzSjc0KWpvovt1jw.text: Had a wonderful breakfast with our server, Laura! The did was yummy. Will be back soon!

cyKXCCw2r8fNNlBbUb2ULQ.text: Just happened to be passing through and found this place on Google. It had high reviews so figured we would try it. Wow!! Food was amazing. The portions are huge! The salsa had a good flavor as well as the potatoes. I had the breakfast burrito!! Definitely would have it again. Josh our server was great!! This place is a must try.

nRBsZ0GIpv7QGg0s00656g.text: Today was our first time here and OMG it was so good!!! Our server was Ethan and he was so nice and attentive to whatever we need. I'm coming back to this place! I love it!

e2KNWALnUy86sfXNC3471w.text: Egg Works is eggcellent!! Nicole our server was awesome and funny! You can't go wrong with any plate on the menu!!

Y4sin2YN_cnl7qxrtzaBsA.text: Been here a couple of times now and service is outstanding...especially our waitress Reina... So cheerful.  Best biscuits and gravy in town...the gravy has real sausage in it!

Z8TzkFdIauI2-10vO5mebw.text: Egg Works definitely deserves its high star rating.  The service was friendly and helpful.  The food came out fast.  Try the biscuits and gravy.  Delicious!  The banana bread was a revelation.

FVUTrLNMarlRwtkVA7I-SQ.text: PK our server is wonderful. He's super nice and on top of everything and will sing "Somewhere over the Rainbow" on request.   The food is amazing, never disappointed  my favorite order is the half order of Veggie Benny. Thank goodness half orders are a thing, because I wouldn't be able to finish a full order. Servings here are huge!!

y6GcduuzFneb1Xrr12DIkw.text: Not the most amazing food in the world but it's reasonably priced and very good. The parfait could be layered better for mixing. The staff is extremely friendly and very helpful. Would definitely recommend this place and we will be back the next time we are in the area and hungry for breakfast food.
