seYm_RjKmvOIb0_WbU59yg.text: Food and service is excellent!!! Our server Alexa is very attentive and very nice. We will surely come back again

7T6AAAHflJEvBiJrcU60zA.text: Love Egg Works! It's always busy, but have never had to wait more than 10 minutes. I have tried many things, but my favorite is the Sunrise Mountain with bacon. So yummy and cheesy!! And I really like that you can get different sides besides the potatoes. I'm not a huge potato fan at breakfast, so I always get cottage cheese and there is no extra charge! BONUS!! Alexa is a wonderful server. She kept our drinks full and even gave me a Diet Coke to go too!!! This is one of my favorite breakfast places in Henderson!!

Hc6a3RcY9gZJq5WhI0d_qA.text: This place is amazing! Great prices i paid $20 for 2 meals! The services is always great! They always go above and beyond! I come eat here almost every sat!!!! The food is delicious!!! This is definitely my morning place. We recently went back and was served by victoria who i believe is one of the managers there! Her service was amazing!! Brought us extra cream for our coffees, boxes to go, and lids for our syrups! She was amazing!!!

unqzQNmFKxZSz0Um7T6MNQ.text: Really great food with an extensive menu. Service was very good and I will make it a point to eat there when I am in town!

YHAQLhm_mQFl4OyTFyJtdQ.text: Wow! What a fabulous new dining experience!  Another new Las Vegas  restaurant for us. Huge portions, one of a kind banana-nut muffin, delicious coffee - hot chocolate mix! The skillets, tho..... we had the country works skillet (gluten free), stuffed French toast sandwich, the veggie omelet with extra bacon, and Ensenada breakfast burrito...all simply extraordinary! Each skillet had an unique scrumptious flavor. Such excellent service from Rob G. And Dianne!!  He was so personable and anticipated the needs our group of five! Make your way to Eggs Works, you won't regret it!

QvBftLHsbBF1rRAw8fFmGg.text: My wife and I love this place. Great omelettes and the service is always excellent. Despite being crowded the vast majority of the time, the wait is never too bad. Plus, try allow small dogs on their patio, which we love.

h3CxHgVAHycZjE4qW3LYcQ.text: 1. The works Bloody Mary 2. In house banana muffins 3. Habla diablo potatoes 4. Carrot cake French toast 5. Tuna melt  Guest service, large food portions, great pricing, delicious food and kid family friendly. Worth the wait if busy!

APcvD39z6-mdY2J_9VaYTg.text: Went here on s recommendation  it was so buddy we could not get in. Second time we got a table service great  food was great loved the omelette And hash browns were great. Highly recommend this place

avnfOP1U-7c50FrR69dXog.text: First time visit and the food was terrific as was the service.  I had the Chile Renellos omelette.  The spices  and amount of sauce were perfect.  The pepper was not over cooked.  I had the beans and rice and they were just as one would expect from a Mexican cuisine.  My spouse order CinnciChili 5 way and he was able to recapture his childhood through a meal.  My niece ordered a burger and fries.  The fries are seasoned deliciously and the burger was juicy.  My sister had strawberry stuffed French toast.  Wow!  Unbelievably beautiful and sumptuous. I can highly recommend this place.  If you want an egg dish they got it and more.

hx4aJPLmAxXdPpVXr0zyQA.text: Holy geebus.   Whatever you do... get that banana nut muffin. What the hell is going on in that little muffin top. How is it so dang MOIST? Seriously the most moist thing I've ever had. I will be honest -- I'm don't even think I like bananas very much. But this? This is heaven. How to make it fit for gods? Slather on some butter. Done and done!   I've been back quite a few times after bf introduced me to this place (it's arguable that's how he trapped me in the first place). Everything I've had here has been either good or great. It's a solid breakfast/brunch place.   I think my favorites that I've tried so far is probably the Loco Moco (I crave this stuff... I've tried quite a few and this is probably the best!) and the blackened prime rib eggs benny. YUM! YUM! YUM!

mS9FVny85xk-6q4i7PWtfw.text: Their food selection here is huge and definitely accommodates everyone. The staff is friendly and the service is really quick. Even at peak times in the morning you won't wait to long for a table. My favorite thing is their mash potato omelet & my husband loves the Loco Moco. Their pricing is pretty standard and it's a good around the corner breakfast place.

D1dKdm2iEBQTT79_jSUqwg.text: The food is always amazing here but, PK made my experience! He was friendly, fast and informative! It always makes the meal so much more pleasant when you have someone with a huge smile on their face serving it! THANKS PK!   As far as the food...my favorite from here is the chili relleno with potatoes and its always perfection!! But, this place is so consistent that, whatever you order is sure to please!

FzDrRposvvY2hzSmkaoU5g.text: Mario is an exceptional server!    He's friendly, funny, and exhibits a refreshingly great attitude!   Thank you for starting our day off right!!!!!!

pt1sDsdv9hLyRtrDjck0rQ.text: Food is always good.  Pk is the best waiter!   We go there often and have never had a bad meal no matter what we order.

iPGcb_zNwOomBbBdAVG-lg.text: This place is my favorite breakfast place in the area. I usually go with the French toast works. It's hard to mess that up I know but I love their French toast and the syrup they use. You can really tell the difference in their syrup. Not overly sweet, but just good syrup. The wait time isn't usually too bad and their service is excellent. It can get pretty busy in there sometimes, but well worth it. They never have let me down! Guaranteed you can take family there and don't have to be worried they might serve bad quality food. Keep it up egg works!

YnjwtMNqMhoaCwS6oaxPPg.text: Aaaaaaaabsolutely delicious! Tried this restaurant, while waiting on our cars just out of the blue and it was a pleasant surprise! Sat at the bar, b/c it was quite a wait, first sign of a deliciously wonderful place to eat.  For this to be a place tht focuses on eggs, the have a huge variety of options. A little bit of everything! The food was a amazing, fresh coffee, delicious food and a tasty complimentary muffin tht was delicious! Everything we ate, was just mouth watering...   Now lets tlk about the service... it was phenomenal! I havent had great service here out in Las Vegas... but this felt like a nice homey atmosphere. Our server was quick, efficient, and still very friendly! I could tell the staff was superb, by the family sitting next to us. Pretty much we knew they were regulars by everyone in the restaurant coming to greet them and congratulate them on their good news! The server had a great attitude and did her job well, even though I knew she was busy it didnt show the slightest!  Overall, this was an excellent place to eat, I cant wait to go back for our next breakfast!

DbfSeaZxheKZwfREyi-ZLA.text: Really good food. Really good service. No wait at all to be seated. Banana nut muffins are delicious! I got the three pigs omlet and it was huge. It was good and I loved that it had real cheese on it. The husband got an egg dish with chili. The chili was really good. His plate was better than mine. Delicious. We will be back!

BF07wpYE8C-smacTILU24Q.text: I've been here twice so far and I was pleased both times. The food is excellent. The first time I got a breakfast skillet and the second time I got eggs benedict. The skillet was amazing but I thought the ham on the eggs benedict was a little chewy. Our server this last time was great. He was really on it, I wish I remembered his name. The portions are huge, big enough to share. It gets pretty crowed and can be a little noisy. Both times I've had to wait for a table but it's worth the wait.   You can usually find a coupon in some of the tourist books. I've also seen it on groupon.

CBnKehWbpZ-3aYLCPw5DVA.text: Food was not that great but decent. The three stars are mainly because the service. Waitress Nicole was awesome an attentive Food also came out quick.

aGIRAUBVKeOO19TV21vR8w.text: Had an amazing breakfast and started my morning with a laugh thanks to our server PK!! Excellent food and even better service!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Santa Cruz and Veggie skillet, yes please!! Had a great breakfast that started off with a laugh thanks to our amazing server PK!

Yj6R9fGvCnXpoSL1n_s_4g.text: Food was OK.  While we did have PK as our server, it was slightly disingenuous to be constantly reminded to provide 5 stars for mediocre service.  We had to ask a different server for a take home box.  What's is even more remarkable is that we were followed out the door and "gently reminded" to provide 5 stars.  If the service warranted 5 stars, believe me, I would gladly have provided it.  Good luck, PK.  I hope my rating did not hinder your chances to win the contest.

sjTQOevvWWbkqktMsnkpbQ.text: Man, this place is GOOD!  Like really really good!    We went there this morning after my sister and I ran a 5k. We met my parents there who said they didn't have to wait for a table at all, score!  They have cute menus that look like mini newspapers and a huge selection of breakfast items!  Each page more delicious-sounding than the last!  I opted for the veggie egg crepe (yes that's right CREPE) because guess what? This item isn't made like a desserty crepe, it's a crepe made from EGG which makes it healthy and filling. The crepe was filled with spinach, mushrooms, cheddar (i swapped it for the Swiss) and guacamole and it was delicious. They served it with a side of Italian dressing but I liked it better with ketchup, but that's just me. It also came with really good potatoes that were seasoned with paprika or seasoned salt which was great.   Oh and I forgot to mention two things. 1.  It also came with this yummy banana muffin (almost like an appetizer) and 2.  Each dish can be made as a half size order which is more than filling.   My dad had The Works which he said was "fabulous" and my mom had their Greek scramble but had them turn it into an omelette. My sister got their stuffed French toast which just looked fancy delish.   Also special shout out to the staff there who extremely attentive and friendly. I really can't find any flaws and will definitely go back there again!

TDlvnxkAu_puoNwj6j_smw.text: I love when I visit Las Vegas to always have breakfast at egg works ! It's the best !! Banana muffins are amazing too !

OLDhoNLJT_hH8UQDzOvmpQ.text: For a Sunday brunch, the wait time wasn't bad.  Lots of great food choices, good coffee & even some local Hawaii favorites!   Excellent food & service by PK!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

EB4AsWANZFrYDGR2sUV1xQ.text: This place is always slammed which is fine if they had a hostess in place or one that knows what she's doing. I've been there several times and it seems like a server is always trying to help the hostess figure out a confusing. We waited 20 mins longer than she quoted us. Another thing I don't like is there is literally not one thing on the menu that isn't full of fat and calories other than the oatmeal I think. Most restaurants give a heathy option area or at least 2-3 choices of a lower calorie meal. We won't go back again for that reason. But don't worry about my review a lot of people love this place and like I said it's always packed

id_hfr-ty2DbfqMlfW6ZRA.text: I've been coming here for a few years. As a local, I can say that this is one of the better places to catch an early breakfast, or brunch. Seating is quick, food is out at a timely manner. The staff is friendly, and attentive.always a pleasure. Thank you Ashley H! Great service skills! Someone give that girl a trip to Disneyland!

lUKIgelXtuekXnLDg4vvEg.text: We had an EGGcellent experience at Egg Works. The food was amazing the portions were huge and the service was amazing! Big Thank you to PK for his amazing service

BAce-YQjG-G-t1Kpp8IYow.text: We had an awesome experience and our server Ashley was so sweet.   We had never been and she gave us her recommendations!!! We had the Santa Cruz Skillet and the bacon/avocado omelette.  Both excellent choices! We will definitely come back in on our next trip in town.

b6Zpgsn55KlBwHz4fvD0DA.text: Good food, service, and menu. Never disappoints and always a good value. Makes it better when you have a Groupon

NjdZ5fe7062cwbpZqOwynQ.text: It would get less than 1 star if possible.    When this branch on Eastern in Henderson first opened they appeared to make an effort to please the local customer base.  We have tried it three or four times.  We have not been here for a couple of months.    Oh my, how fast it has become a has been.  No more tries at this particular site.    One order was wrong and the waitress was admittedly 'sorry', enough to offer to 'take care of it' without us asking.  Her idea of taking care of the matter  was to write a note on the ticket "Wrong omelet, but ate anyways"... it was half eaten because we were looking for the ham, when we realized it was a mistake we notified the waitress, who did little but write a very rude note and attach it to our check.    The other order was served incorrectly also, but- with much delay- corrected.  We left without finishing half of either meal.  We left a small tip anyways for a small effort.  The cheery serving staff that was here at the opening has left behind a rather bland, unpleasant staff that is only half interested in making this site as homey as other ones.    With so many offerings in the Las Vegas area for breakfast, it would be a better experience to give your business to a nearby alternative, in fact, any nearby alternative.

ziAudmnNn0j94CCbYYZRgw.text: Everything was great. Potatoes are something else. And French toast with blueberries and bacon were on point. Definitely be back. Thanks Reina!

CxSZOVNtsFe_zSAge2lPuA.text: Really enjoyed this place mostly because of the service! We had the server, Monica, and she did an excellent job! She always kept on top of what we needed and served us our food in time. We never had to flip the egg. :)   As for the food, I really enjoyed the banana bread French toast and the fruit parfait. My cousin had the bacon avocado omelet and I had some of that and it was really good!!

vk-x9M-2d6tNvrvk6HQrbg.text: Love this place, come almost every weekend. Love their omelets and especially yummy Huevos Rancheros!

01fhfvCDgN9FYb7LNkS3dg.text: Love the chicken enchilada omelette. Alwayd great service. My kids like watching the train that they have close to the ceiling. Never had a bad dish here....eggs benedict, skillets, island breakfast, banana nut muffins....always good

cxvsBcuGozUbibGJd5hkAQ.text: First time here, this place is off the hook.  Don't let the name fool you're at food huge portions  it should be the best food and service on the planet.  But that is too long so it's Eggworks.  Start by asking to sit in PK's section. Now it's like you have a butler for your every need.  Great food, huge portions and personal service...oh and prices anyone can afford.

94lpZyc2EJ8ao5l1Y6lwjg.text: Love this place! The southwestern cobb salad is amazing! So is the huevos rancheros! Our waitress, Manuela, is such a sweetheart! We always ask for her. She is so helpful! Will go back again and again.

You can't go wrong with this very down to EARTH breakfast joint!

She was super nice.    - in fact we thought she was the owner...  Thank you for making our experience very nice.  Regards,  Rosie and Dori and Pat

yNqXEorAvf3WMIZQeqUT2Q.text: The food is always good but the service by PK is awesome!  He serves good food, always with a big smile. He definitely brings the Aloha!

aMo0-iqeLduF7vuUEZZvYw.text: Another beautiful Egg Works location!  I love this place just as much as I love the other ones!

fZU2wluZ9GI1MxMg44LbUw.text: Best breakfast in my neck of the woods... Server was Manuela and she was better than the breakfast!

0cdUQBdGHS2Swp5Pa1Xgww.text: Excellent everything! Great food, great prices and great service! New go to place for breakfast or lunch. Rich and Rochelle were absolutely awesome. Be back soon.

Pf_jzVDg-aYN7jKORdYkmg.text: If you're hungover, don't go to some stupid fast food joint. Go to Egg Works. I've had food at both locations, and am never disappointed. Get the Works Veggie Benny. It is amazeballs. Edit OH GOD THE BANANA NUT MUFFIN. SO GOOD YOU'LL CRY.

xgo9tKabiayRZbXUlGPrKA.text: The food was perfect and my server Kelli was more than helpful and polite. I'll be back.

5Ixsme1MwPr-vqowq1osIg.text: 5 of us came in and were greeted with a big smile. I loved my skillet and the other four loved their meals also. The potatoes are great and I loved them and was stealing off of peoples plates. Great way to start the morning.

PyKLbGJ2QkmoFez09I810A.text: Fantastic breakfasts!! The salsas add such flavor to the eggs and omelettes. Banana muffins rock! Bruce was a super server!

1nUfKGndtSlcrKgP6gOxgw.text: Egg Works is a good place to go for breakfast since Vegas doesn't have the best options for locals. The service is pretty good and the menu has a wide selection. However, I dislike their coffee and it is a little expensive.

tclN3g2-1coLlz1JisV6dA.text: Our company comes here every week for breakfast and we always appreciate the freshness of the food and the excellent service.  Our waiter today, Brandt, was new and still in training, but I wanted to say that he did an excellent job. Service was quick, responsive and friendly. All of the servers are great at this location and Brandt is a welcome addition. Thanks Egg Works!

Ruv2Em07_rq8Fka9FyL9uQ.text: There are a lot of hidden menu items so don't be afraid to ask. Kelli our waitress was great and didn't mind me asking questions. Most of their menu items can be cut in half and if you don't want the potatoes you can have fresh fruit. I ordered a half order of the stuffed French toast and fruit. I was expecting the usual cup of diced fruit with mostly grapes. Imagine my surprise when I got a slice of fresh watermelon, cantaloupe, pineapple, honeydew, and grapefruit. Definitely coming back!

21Ho5B4DTSZknG_9h-ueaA.text: Our Favorite Place for Breakfast and they have the best banana muffin.  PK is the best WAiter, super friendly, outstanding service. PK you awesome!

kdw3L0l3yZ4awRo5mH-RjA.text: Deanna is a very good server. Everything turned out perfect and in a timely matter. We love going ti Egg Works. We always get good service. People are very friendly at thi restaurant.

TzSsnvsBGHpIrkDR7_0eXQ.text: Went to Egg Work for breakfast this morning, since I am local I had been this location (On Eastern) for so many times, in general my experience were positive. However today just one bad employee and make my experience upside down.  Everything was good until I when to paid my bill. As usual I used coupon and paid with my credit card and I knew Egg Work require the cashier to check ID for all credit card pays. The cashier (Alice or Alicia) once she saw my credit card she asked for my ID. Here came to the problem, I remove my ID and hold it to show her, instead reviewing my ID. She just so busies doing something else and I was holding my ID about a minute and I though by now she should had enough time to review my ID. Than I put my ID away, by than she raise her head and tell me she did not see my ID yet. (Giving me a facial sour attitudes), I was very offended by her attitudes. I told her I was holding my ID about a minute for you to review it, and she reply with her attitudes " I am busy doing your coupon". At this point I did not want to continue the conversation, I just sign my credit card bill and left. And I was so unhappy her attitude and I forgot to give tips to my wait staff. When I realize it I stop my car and walk back inside the restaurant to pay the tips to wait staff.

IWoNl92eP7DLHLiUoW1JiA.text: This place is so amazing!!!!! Our waitress Jaszmin was awesome! The banana nut muffin tasted like cake! I got the fiesta skillet with chorizo! My husband got the stuffed French toast! Def recommend this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

ibE9qwOlXfvAtDwkTNiPBA.text: Went I with my family on Saturday morning, place wasn't too busy when we arrived, walked right in. Very surprised since it was around. 9:30. Anyways, menus are pretty nifty like newspapers. Egg decor all around, gives you the farm style feeling, liked it. Food was delicious, just a little too much cheese on omelettes. Chili relleno, crazy chicken, and strawberry cream cheese French toast all a must try. Debra ( Deborah?) our server was DELIGHTFUL & on point, never had to ask for refills, or extra napkins she was always right there when we needed her. She was very helpful in answering all of our questions.  Overall great visit, we will be back!

rXPi_KKI2m4vINk3vwF8-Q.text: PK was awesome as always! Service and food were excellent and he is very patient with our kids! Had the Mexican skillet and the carnitas tacos were new choices for us and delicious.

B4URAGZY_ufsoJ4h-yImNQ.text: Great breakfast! The Italian skillet was tasty and fresh, the Mexican burrito was spicy and filling. Dolly was our very attentive and courteous waitress.

wAVyGZdjAYrfEmUz_7Rq0A.text: Very possibly the worst meal I've had in my life! The service was fine but the food was inedible. THe "fluffy scrambled eggs on a fres croissant" was actuall a croisant in the bottom of a stoneware skillet smothered in egg, cheese and sausage. Greasiest thing I've ever had put in front of me.  Other items looked just as bad. The lady sitting nest to me had the taco salad and the smell of the canned salsa made me nauseous.  The "good ole tymie" decor added inslult to injury. Never again.

MVDmXeQYN4Rwq_W4JDD0FQ.text: Hostess and employees are very friendly.  Great menu to choose from.  Horrible lighting, very cute painting on wall, the food is not bad, but for the price...it should be better.  I doubt I'll eat here again.   I just didn't get that warm fuzzy "I want to eat breakfast" cozy feeling.

O4zTb5lkuuy7QdOMjkWgkA.text: I purchased a groupon and took my family there for  breakfast. It was my first time eating here. Absolutely amazing food.Our waiters name was paul. One of the best waiters we have had in long time.Will definitely be returning and will always ask for Paul to be our waiter.

rFf3Bzqeq1zIzKxDLOwu2A.text: Great food, great service!  Love this place!  Our server, ALEX was awesome as always!

e__n2j4_nUDrsRR4KHP5KQ.text: This is our go to breakfast spot. Always consistent and friendly service. I have tried a variety of menu items and have been pleased with all. My only complaint would be that they don't have hash browns. The cubed frozen potatoes are ok, but am more of a hash brown guy.

qy_YAkEH4uRleu1-lPwZUQ.text: Great food and service. PK took great care with us, as it's our first-of what will be more-visit. Wide variety of tasty food.

RKwy-WQd0XWOQLLi9uA5Gg.text: My wife and I had breakfast today at our Egg Works, near Sun City Anthem.  One of my favorite breakfast dishes is a Loco Moco.  When I asked our waitperson, Rita, to make sure the beef patty was not overcooked, she assured me she knew exactly what I wanted and would tell the chef/cook to prepare it that way.    Boy, she was right!  The burger patty, when I barely cut into it with my fork, melted into perfectly cooked rice & blended with a dark, rich gravy in a way I've never had before!  I've had this dish in Hawaiian restaurants and none came close to the perfection of this one today.    I thank Rita for making sure my Loco Moco was the best...EVER!

MUHhQN6I6L_NnL9ES0CxWQ.text: my boyfriend and I got here as often as we can. it's seriously the best breakfast place we've been too. the service, the food, everything. would definitely recommend this place to anyone.

I might add, that these were weekdays & not very busy at all.  Will not return.

4oH-ISHjZk0BXrsOqZFLwQ.text: The food and service was on point. The food came within a timely fashion; but the banana nut muffins omg, can u say I had to get one to go...

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Works crepe and potatoes...

URrY3p5zxv1AOxb0RylqcQ.text: Good place for traditional breakfast or brunch got a free banana nut muffin with my order with the Yelp coupon. I had with a corned beef hash , which was good but I found it on the salty side. My server did let me know when I ordered it that some people do find it salty. All in all though the eggs over easy were spot on and the potatoes or very good as well. The service might be considered slow, but when taking into consideration how busy the place was I think they did a fine job. A nice place for Sunday brunch, breakfast with friends, or some good food after a night out or a morning at the gym. The menu will accommodate all.

aIz9eZn-Wkzdm8jBp3MRrQ.text: Eggs, always perfect every time.  My husband takes his over easy, never a broken yolk.  I take mine poached medium and they are exactly that.  Service is fast, friendly, and efficient.  Side of fruit always fresh and sweet.  We are frequent patrons.

8vR5OaV2uq6C62BBeLmsJw.text: Banana nut muffin was delicious and warm!! The place was great, casual, comfy and the avocado and bacon omelette was perfect:)

9aUU0WO_ema-DeSF_ecOdg.text: I had a great breakfast this morning courtesy of McKensie . and the staff. Mackensie was super attentive, friendly, and quick! I recommend my favorite - - the Egg stuffed French toast!

4J6pPkWKafPBj0LV9BJsoQ.text: I would like to start off by saying it really pisses me off when people (Judy) misuse Yelp to make False accusations about a restaurant.  Being an owner myself, I am very conscious of my Yelp reviews and know how they can effect my business. That said people like Judy, who by the way has no following and never Yelped before suspiciously, should be acknowledged only after several shots of Tequila!! Enough said!!  First visit here with my wife, having a wonderful time. They brought us both complimentary banana muffins for our first visit, nice touch!! Service is great, staff is awesome, and the breakfast is amazing!! My wife ordered the corn beef hash which I tasted and is the best I have had. I did the tradish ham and eggs which was great!  Recommend highly!!

aKC0720moUEkH68W7Gr6CA.text: The food was epic and the service even better! Manuela knocked it out of the park. There will be a bigger review to come in detail of just how tasty this was!

CjeO9SRdhp1nSqgQjxLRBg.text: Ashley is a great waitress! She is very helpful and very patient with new comers like us. Ask for her when you come here. The omelettes are very filling and delicious. Overall a great experience. This place is a keeper!

JRfZLMz97HL46lcF2yifIg.text: Laura was our server on 4/27/2015 and she was excellent and very friendly!  We brought our grandson so things were kind of messy but we were well cared for by Laura and will return again soon.  The Works Veggie Benny is just the best and I order fruit instead of potatoes.  Yummy!!!

pLjrGGxflj_5pwuJ31MFSA.text: I come here for brunch every week with my pals. The food is quite delish, and most definitely affordable (although money is no problem for me). I would be most impressed if they added mimosas to the menu, my brunch would be complete. Robert is an excellent server, I don't believe I've had a better server here.

7w2-9Kq0Oi5NmFdfKyX7kw.text: Really impressed with the service and selection. They have a system where you turn an egg on the top of the table to notify the staff if you need help!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Hot chocolate.
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Cute decor.

21uZIUs7o9F-Q5-OzzpgSg.text: I'm a couple months late on posting this but my girlfriend and I took her parents here on Mother's Day. Being Mother's Day, we expected the place to be crowded and kinda expected a bit of a wait for a table. Surprisingly, we ended up getting a seat pretty quickly. The servers were great and the food was excellent! But the main reason why I give this place 5 stars is because of a particular moment involving the servers and management! Again, being Mother's Day, we expected a bit of a wait for our food which was absolutely fine because we were in no rush. After ordering our food, my girlfriend's parents' food came out pretty fast but my girlfriend and I's food took a little longer. Like I said, we were in no rush so we were totally fine with waiting on food because the place was absolutely packed but our server kept coming over and apologizing that we didn't have our food yet. Once our food did come out, our server apologized again. And then while we were eating this delicious food, a manager came over and apologized once more about the wait and ever gave us 50% off our bill. I don't know if it was because of Mother's Day or this is how the treat all of their customers but I was beyond satisfied with this place and have been recommending Egg Works to everyone since then!

AjFiW_YlaytcDBy3VwyvZg.text: One of my favorite breakfast/lunch spots here in town. I love the omelets and there burgers are a big hit. Friendly staff and service is usually quick. They offer flavored creamers for the coffee (whoo whoo) and the banana nut muffins are awesome. Fyi, check Groupon for deals.. they occasionally have one for egg works.   This restaurant always puts a great start to my day.. and being that breakfast is the most important meal of them all.. I would recommend letting egg works hook you up! Lol

FhhnVYDNeQJIKPsoWddSsA.text: Finally came here to eat for the first time today.  Portions are very generous.  I ordered the crepes thinking I was going to get a light dish. Instead I got a very large and thick omelet that contained mounds of stuff.  I ate small portions of the egg because it was too greasy for me. The cubed potatoes were flavorful and crispy.  But don't let the "crepes" description fool you. It's an omelet. A really, big and thick omelet.

kBt32jpdnU4tdPO-HWPW-A.text: Our waitress Sara was amazing. She was very fast and super friendly. There was a bit of a wait to get a table but that's expected on a Sunday morning. Food was amazing and the portions were perfect. The BananaNut Muffin was amazing fresh and tasted amazing

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

voBzD6fOCQDd8pn1pLR2lQ.text: Awesome brunch place!  Great for kids too...  portions are large so make sure you come hungry

M6KvYcL8bDNfIEVmSuIYsw.text: This place is delicious!! Fast service, cheerful staff, great food, lots of options for all types of eaters.   This is one of the many times I've been here, but today our server needed a shoutout. Reina was attentive, pleasant, and made sure we were happy each minute of our meal. She's fantastic!!   Thanks guys! We'll definitely be here again.

Mv4Wj10SXESAVmRqhAAGgg.text: Always amazing food and Gabriel was awesome!!! Couldn't ask for better service  Ask to sit in his section when you come in, you won't be disappointed.

AZHbqrmExsDyCadXNa-3YQ.text: Great warm American style restaurant far away from the busy feel of Vegas.  The breakfasts are large and well prepared. Service is friendly and efficient.  This location also has outdoor seating for mild weather dinning.

TRqh1siF80Br0zgur_5OtQ.text: Glad they moved to Anthem location!  My wife and I used to drive across Hendo to the Sunset location.  A bit of a headache but worth it for the jalapeno scramble.  When we saw the location coming together just moments from our house, we were excited!    Super busy here too just like on Sunset. We, of Henderson, truly love our breakfast food. :)  Anyway, Eggworks continues to be our weekend breakfast stop...and some other days too.

SwamZc4P-_8Uji1u_agiyA.text: EVERYTIME I eat here, all the servers and hostess are extra friendly and welcoming. They seem like genuinely happy people.  Their smiles are always contagious. Today we are sitting outside.  I should have worn sunglasses. No spectacular view, just the parking lot and cars on Eastern Ave. the radio is on the speakers. The sun feels nice with the cold air. The menu is in news paper fashion. I had apple juice and a breakfast burrito with egg whites and a side of sour cream.  I would give the food 3 stars.  Our server has the same name as me. She was very nice and attentive like all the servers I have had here.  They have an egg that you flip to alert for service, but I haven't ever needed to use it. They have a good variety on their menu and it is one place that I can order something different every time. For two of us our check came out to $22.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Breakfast burrito

treu4t4p0Q8gcBtINrPnpw.text: I had county fried steak, perfectly average. Not a very big portion for almost $12. Potatoes are quite salty. My mother ordered the fritata, came out covered in feta cheese, tons of it, even though the specials board listed it as having cheddar jack cheese. They remade it, no big deal. I am not fond of the atmosphere, very bright fluorescent lighting, feels very commercial. Our server Nicole was very nice.

x4_M_RebuQZBD1ULHzskJQ.text: This place is great for everyone and especially a family place. Food is incredible and I love the seasoning they use on the potatoes. Love the French toast and love the skillets. You won't be disappointed.

m8N54qV4R2mQFVDuKFihBw.text: Egg Works is my favorite breakfast spot. Probably come here once or twice a month with wife and kids. They added a train that rides along the top of the wall where the ceiling starts. Both my kids love it. Food is delicious; they have classics as well as some new takes on breakfast dishes. Came here last weekend when my dad was in town and got the smiley chipotle eggs Benedict and it was very good.  Service is always outstanding as well and prices fair. Now that we live on this side of town we will be here much more often!

VwLbgcBAIejRJMYL54_2cw.text: Everyone that works at this location is friendly and helpful! We've eaten here on a regular basis for the past year and love the consistency. Dee, Laura and Josh stand out as our favorites though! We've never had a bad meal here. The patio is nice too- when the weather is agreeable! You also get a free muffin when you check-in here. I've enjoyed everything from omelettes, crepes, beni's to lunch on the rare occasions. Keep up the good job Egg Works!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Crazy chicken omelette

eLs46lmmQGGP0cJvZGQU1A.text: Hmmm, no acknowledgement after being seated, flipped the unhappy face and no one noticed! Finally our busy waiter came and can't stop calling us "guys", so finally our food comes from another waiter who calls us guys too! Can't learn them anything! That's why there is help wanted signs posted around the place!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

Y8v7nLEwK5MV34RgARdS2Q.text: The food was amazing and so was the service.  We had the banana nut bread French toast with a side of sausage patties and the special with eggs turkey ham steak and potatoes with banana nut muffin.  We took home leftovers was so much food.  You have to try the hot sauce on your potatoes it's so good! This will be our go to from now on don't sleep on this place.  We went to the Sunset/Eastern location.

ek3nWHVsAb9uekLGtanP-w.text: Yum, yum ,yum!!! Walking out with a full belly, leftovers, and a smile. I have always enjoyed the food here, but this time (egg-specially) the service was aaaamazing! Our waitress, Victoria the key manager, was fantastic. Made sure our orders were all correct, brought us extra coffee without being asked, and suggested checking in for a free muffin...the banana nut muffins here are absolutely delicious!   Great breakfast, brunch, and lunch place.

y_Yj08_f6xiB9KL-5_BvqQ.text: Victoria was awesome! Food quality and quantity were great! We love the service flag system to show if you need assistance.  Great atmosphere in dinning area and low wait time. We will return!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. This system allows the whole egg works team to service their customers&#39; needs.

p6ZYMhbziYItM_MkzPSHag.text: Every week my girlfriend and I come here for breakfast or lunch, depends when we wake up. I guess you could call us regulars! Today we had Manuela as our server and she did an amazing job! My girlfriend wasn't a fan of a breakfast item and Manuela told her that she could get something else instead of paying for something she didn't like. Which is a first, cause I've never heard anything like that before, but it is was nice! This place always has the best service and that's why we come here all the time!! So thank you Manuela!!

bjQsLFlBPOEQMBxOVtzwaA.text: I love EGG WORKS! There was a never a time I've came and didnt enjoy my food or the service. Our server was name Ethan. He was so great at making sure everything was ok with us. He was also very apologetic when our food wasn't coming out yet, even tho we didn't mind the wait!  I ordered the egg work omelet. I'm not the usual person that likes to try new things when I go to similar places, I always order the same thing over & over. But it was actually worth the change. It was delicious! My boyfriend ordered the corn beef hash & oh my gosh kinda of reminded me of back home  he finished it in like 5 min! Lol.  & you can't forget the banna nut muffin, seriously the best I've ever had!  Seriously if you haven't been here before your totally missing out .

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

Tvbndt2hQ4dLfJ9YwsZVxQ.text: AMAZING!! Always walk out of here completely satisfied. From the service to the quality of their meals this is one of our favorite breakfast/lunch spots!   This time Brandt was our server he was Great! Very friendly, perfect service timing, follow up was also great. Didn't have to wait on him for anything.   We typically get the classic Benedict, Loco Moco and always get the side muffin. The muffin always completes the meal for me it's my favorite side item.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Classic Benedict

bpp3N0iBURzGD8VcgdqxVA.text: My family and I came to try out Egg Works for the first time because my husband found a deal on Groupon. We both used to work for a very well known breakfast chain so our expectations tend to be high. We really enjoyed the food and service at Egg Works. Evan, our server, made the whole experience for us. He brought a muffin out for our children right after taking our order before the food came out. As you can imagine that was a hit for our kids. The food came out hot and fast even with the restaurant at capacity. We will definitely be back and make sure to ask for Evan again.

ItqiH-y8bJYPWVob-koTeg.text: Decor was a little weird but I got an amazing eggs Benedict, one of the best I've ever had. I'm often disappointed by breakfast potatoes but these ones were good and came for free with my meal. The service was great! Very attentive and didn't rush us out.

K3Gr3SeOs77WCXgbR75MKA.text: Quick and friendly service! Food was delicious. The place is absolutely adorable.

dNi640T88F3HtMjbapspSQ.text: The food was very good I ordered pancakes, scrambled eggs, and sausage links. The food was very big portions and the waitress was very nice. She made our breakfast more enjoyable and we will be coming again.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States

QXgjlc1P68NG-HCUSb0xLA.text: They are always consistent.  Great food, friendly people. A nice local gem. The wait on the weekends can be brutal but they make up for it with the great food.

hZotOqf9y4bCK1Ygfqp6Wg.text: This is always a go-to for my family, it's right around our area. The place is easily accessible, clean, and has good food. My son and I came here the other day w his aunt, during a weekday is the time to come! Usually during the weekend, the place is packed and rightfully so.   They have a good vanilla cappuccino - I think it's the one that's similar to the ones they have at gas stations, but it's still really good.  The banana nut muffin is so good! So soft and flavorful. It usually comes w the meals, I believe. I always order spam and rice. That's why I love this place - allergic to eggs and don't really like bfast foods, so SPAM it is. They give you two pretty big cuts of spam and really good, soft white rice. It comes w eggs but I always sub it for some fruit.  My son, always orders pancakes from the kids menu. You get a free drink and a huge pancake along w either bacon or sausage - all for under 5 bucks.   I think this is just a great establishment. Nice staff. Good bfast food. We will continue to keep coming back.

n9DHqIfw2ozGFl0X4srh5Q.text: Girlfriend  B Day ,didn't  even  sing happy B Day to her sang it to somebody  else  felt  even.

xfMij8cFHYmbQD2U-QTltQ.text: Ashley was the best server! Very friendly and did a great job. Enjoyed all the food and the service was excellent I would eat here anytime. There are choices of food for everyone. The Denver omelette was very delicious. Everything that's been said about the banana but muffins is True THEY ARE DELICIOUS!!

OqgMO8TXoqLYv-Bs75kSIw.text: The food here is always great from the bacon avacado omelette to the veggie Benedict and the chicken fried steak skillet awesome.

TehIqiUU1WK823Gaa4Xrwg.text: Ate here with my family this morning...we're originally from Hawaii so our server PK was a great reminder of home...he was awesome in tending to our table! We definitely plan to make it a more routine breakfast spot!

Lpk6rod0w8gcPhzul0-1Jw.text: This place has the BEST breakfast, and great service. Ethan was our waiter and he was super nice and very speedy! The best part though, is the food. I ordered the corned beef hash. It was the best I've ever had. It came with breakfast potatoes, eggs and toast/muffin. The banana nut muffin was worth going back for, just on its own. My hubby ordered the loco moco. The burger was cooked perfectly, the gravy was great, and it came with all the same sides as the corned beef hash. He can't go on enough about it. We also ordered a stack of original pancakes, and they were amazing as well. It was more than enough food! We will definitely be returning! I suggest everyone try this place out at least once.

pEXDloWRYfsQsRbr-1-Txg.text: Outstanding food and service. Randi was very nice and helpful!!!  The food was amazing. The country gravy is some of the best I have ever had. The prices are also really reasonable.

ARkuXYlSL0K07fFkgHlNWw.text: To be far I tried this place twice. Very disappointed as it is across the street from my residence. Totally over priced !!  Slow service ..poor quality. My favorite egg dish is Eggs Benedict....  a total disaster.   I'll drive the 12-15 min. to go back to Blueberry Hill Rest.  They get it right 100% of the time.

RYZIEnL2Xg2V92qVl21HHg.text: Great service this morning.  The food is always good but this morning our server, McKenzie, was exceptional.  Service was fast, efficient and polite.  She was friendly without being chatty, very professional.

Jo5_qHkTTaIJTGvEAN4R7g.text: This place has horrible food. The kitchen is a wreck and needs new leadership. Three other patrons were returning food at the same time we were. Dont eat here

pYcZj-WBMWgP5MA6Fl6hew.text: First time tying this place. The Food is mediocre of that. I personally did not enjoy my food the only one good I can say is the banana but muffin was the best thing they had. And the salsa is terrible pros are service was good at least this visit

hynvT7yfzgjq9WfRlmYS2g.text: Large portions of decent food (large enough to share) and good friendly service.

VYd-XorsqIXlagCJ32W1Zg.text: Whoa!  Great service and awesome food...always a little wait to get in, but they move people along very quickly...The Banana muffins are very special...and so is everything else.  The staff works very hard to take care of you.  If something is not quite right..just speak up and they will fix it immediately....

DilH4fOw7_PGpKe1OCrAxw.text: WE love breakfast/lunch restaurants. This was our first time to Egg Works but will definitely not be our last. Food was delicious, presentation was above average and the best part for me was the server PK. The only thing I like better than going out for breakfast/brunch is having a server with both a personality and sense of humor. PK is an entertaining guy and made brunch today F U N !

ocGYUzoMDhZ6J3fp6p12aQ.text: Great food, as always!  We had a party of 12 on a busy Sunday morning.  We scored a GREAT waitress, Manuela.  She had control of us right from the start, did an awesome job and never missed a beat.  Thanks for a great morning of great food and a great time spent with visiting family for the RiSE Festival.  We will be back :)

89Tfov_lzMYpH1ee17-x8w.text: Robert was really helpful and provided us with everything we asked for. He brought us flavored coffee creamer and water with our coffee. Thanks to Robert we had a great experience. Will be back again!

2_wFunxqufHP71PhqdKIeQ.text: PK has helped us multiple times and it's always a pleasure! We continue to return to places with great service and great food. I tell all my friends about it as well!

DXAMPpiy87O21FGg-NGMpA.text: 5 stars for the service. We live in the Bay Area and each time we come over Vegas, we try to stop here to see our great waiter PK! Such a nice waiter to have for your first meal of the day! The food is good too! Great combo to have in the morning! Make sure to check it out! Highly recommend PK to serve you!

x9Kcp6DrdF29KUB0xI0Ksw.text: My wife and I just had breakfast this morning.  She had the Fresh Veggie Omelette and I had 2 Banana Cakes with a side of scrambled egg.  Although the food was delicious, what made this an exceptional experience for both of us was the impeccable service we received from Andrea.  Her attention to details, flawless service, and her extremely pleasant disposition made our dining experience extremely pleasant and one normally associated with a fining dining establishment.  I would highly recommend Egg Works try to have Andrea cloned, I sense she is what the Gold Standard would be.

pn408QmjA9PKZXzK-iTTbQ.text: The food is good, wide variety and large portions but also, large cost.  I wish they had smaller, cheaper options for seniors on a budget or maybe some early bird specials.

6v5Qs_JRPsHIzskKnqwO5Q.text: Robert provided excellent and timely service! He constantly had a smile on his face and provided friendly suggestions in regards to the menu. Will be back to see him!

FhO0F-Cs0-PgQbPZs2BT3A.text: Ethan was an excellent server; polite and prompt. Love this place for breakfast. Try the huge michelada, its tasty!

I0QSmUkNmeSYVkB2JoQb7Q.text: Hands down to the best homemade banana nut I've ever had!!!! Super fresh, super moist, super duper freaking delicious!!!!!!!

UBA9UuuUY8D7IlHxAR8raA.text: First time at this location but my family and I are regulars at Egg Works next to the airport location. I happen to have seen this location during one of my Orthodontic appointments and I had made a mental note to try this location out.  As always, the service was fast. We were sat right away and our hostess, Laura took our orders immediately. She was very pleasant and cordial. She had a ready sweet smile for us and she was very motherly.  The food was superb and very satisfying. The patrons were mostly of  big families and there were less Milenials. Despite this, the energy of this location was vibrating with excitement.  This location is recommended to all.   Two thumbs up!

qoUueTSbPyHlP5IG2B4aaA.text: Another great breakfast, never disappointed here.  Dani was a great waitress, very friendly and attentive.  We will be back!

jOLi126nLwei8_gonQHp5Q.text: Every time we are in town this is our go to place for breakfast. Love it. Our server Judd was outstanding with our party of 8. See you again in 6 months. P.S. Have you thought about opening up in our neck of the woods, Northern Nevada?

IDNantG6wzNHyrvH8MqSDw.text: One of our favorite breakfast places to go with our friends & family that visit out of town! Each server that we've had have been so great! The food is so delicious & never disappointing...the banana muffin is unique & oh so yummy!

iqy2j4ZOxDkYEzYFuD4EIA.text: Shay deserves 5 stars!!!!!! All day, everyday. We will be back. #earnedhertwentytwopercent

l3RuNFijozvILwZiJpWJXQ.text: What a gem!  Breakfast was great. All the staff are so welcoming but most especially our server Tina. I've never met anyone more attentive and friendly.  Everything about my experience was 5 star and I will definitely be back.

wsAOJ45j7rxiOTyzHH5B4A.text: Delish breakfast with friends and the best waitress Tina!!  She was so attentive, generous and awesome!

ONyNtUigwth0FhSqNSgeiQ.text: Love this place!!! Went here on Easter with the family and it was wonderful! I had the chile relleno omelette and it was sooo good. I was scared it was going to be spicy but it wasn't just had a slight kick to it. My son had one of the skillets and my mom had half portion of an omelette. We really like that they offer the half portions on certain items on the menu. I also had a mimosa which was also wonderful! I like that they offer certain cocktails on their menu. Our server was Joshua and he was awesome such a sweetie and very attentive. Will definitely be back soon!!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Chile relleno omelette.... So bomb!!!!!

xkizu_MzQUdf-QmVe7TUaw.text: In my book, great customer service doesn't automattically translate into a higher rating as reviews should be focused on the food.  But there are a few exceptions and this is one of them.  Our waiter, Manny gave excellent customer service, was very friendly, patient and explained the menu items to us.  The whole restaurant has the home town vibe and is very welcoming.  They have a cute system where if you need something, you turn a tag to the unhappy face.  For the food, this is an excellent breakfast spread.  Be careful when ordering, these are big portions.  The breakfast burrito is a classic dish with beans, eggs, and your choice of protein.  They give tons of potatoes.  The skillets are offered every way you can imagine.  We could barely finish the half order, imagine how a full order would look like.  The total bill for three of us was a tad of $30, it's a great deal.  Recommended.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Breakfast burrito
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Half order skillet
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Half order eggs benedict

4F5FGrm0HzZI8OQ6O-76AA.text: In for breakfast this morning. Staff who greeted us was very friendly.  Had a great booth at the front with our whole family.  Kids love the train on the ceiling along with the coloring and game papers. Wait staff was great and very attentive. Followup was fast. Have to say the food was very good.  Only thing that needed something was the gravy on the biscuit. Taste was more like flour and pepper.  Needed something. All our other plates were very good.  No matter what you get make sure you taste the banana muffin, they are delicious. We got in at about 7:50a. When leaving at about 9a it was rolling. Very nice breakfast, atmosphere here great, family oriented and very efficient and friendly staff.

OFVgITiRo9FpaHwn7Tvcvg.text: Wonderful breakfast! The food was on point and service was great. Tina our server was friendly and super attentive. Their menu is huge so be ready to make decisions. Tina was great at helping out.

NWiCfY6C-s-Ylz08NR7xsQ.text: Jenn is awesome! Wonderful place for family esp with kids! Food is delicious. My son loves the train!!!

kDIPEKP5eiln0oVLife0kA.text: As breakfast restaurants go, egg works is the best way to describe it!! The price is incredible, excellent quality food, and a wonderful staff I had a very pleasant experience with my server Vanessa, incredible service!!I definitely recommend going for the food but also the staff!

onHHLTYdG5UsQm_tV8kPCw.text: Hanging out in Las Vegas we came across this cool place for breakfast.  With an atmosphere that reminds me of Cracker Barrel and a similar staff. They were friendly and I had a good expectation for decent food.   We weren't disappointed. I had "Traditional Benny" (Eggs Benedict) and my wife had a cheese omelette with bacon sans carbs.  The side of potatoes was unique and tasty!  Both meals were very good and the bill came to $29 including tip.   Coffee was served to our table with a carafe which was nice.   A decent place for two or a family. A bit pricey for breakfast but worth it.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Cheese Omelette without carbs.
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Traditional Benny
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Menu

fukklrJejl49EmZRYhQYhA.text: One of my favorite local brunch place, the banana bread french toast is to die for! Shout out to Tina for being a rockstar!!

sHXizRdEBHY-Nvy9S_oFlA.text: The Best Eggs Benedict around and The Works Veggie Benedict is the Bomb! They are most generous with the Hollandaise Sauce  Banana Bread Muffins is free on Your first visit.... Because You will want More!

K0ptXQ_FIyarrasDTSp5Yw.text: Grandparents were in town and wanted brunch, so to Egg Works we went and we definitely left full and satisfied! Highly recommended for quick service and empty tummy's!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Yummy for my tummy! Me and my grandparents left full and satisfied!

The best part is that they serve breakfast all day.

NxoKBshVThNRl-d5U0wjSg.text: The service is always top notch. This time I ordered take out and Robin was our waitress. She was very knowledgeable about the menu and answered all of my questions. I ordered the cornbeef hash and it was delish.

VgBhT_H02Tz7inIQo_b4wQ.text: This is a good breakfast spot in Henderson that provides a large selection including Gluten Sensitive. I ordered the Green Chili Hash, the flavor was awesome but as far as a hash it was lacking in depth and texture. The hash was overwhelming "soft" and really felt more like eggs with shredded green chili pork. My wife ordered a green chili stuffed omelette and it only had a few slivers of green chili in it. The most impressive part was the honesty in Gluten Sensitive options and clearly stating they are a gluten free kitchen.

0EF1ELUmHHJAQ6TIX8PQQw.text: Great menu with lots of choices!  They offer a free Banana Nut muffin coupon on Yelp.  It was delicious. I had the Chile Relleno Omelet, super good.  Our waitress Katlyn provided excellent service with a friendly attitude.  Definitely coming back!

Ul1ZdMIns679xCEg72ScRQ.text: I am so happy they have an egg works in the Henderson area :)  -It's super huge and service is fast -Portions are very large!  FOOD 5/5: -Fiesta ($10 + $2 for chorizo): This was the fiesta skillet and it had chillies, onions, tomatoes, cheese, & I added chorizo (spanish pork sausage) on it. I had sunny side eggs with it. I could only eat half of it & saved the other half for later. The skillets are the BOMB here. -Banana nut bread: Very delicious, it's a must get!

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Banana nut muffin
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Skillet
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Burrito

8bigFYyYXGBtIpnqF57BLw.text: Hubby and I are always looking for a good breakfast place. Tina gave us amazing customer service today. We will definitely be back.

Q-qtu4IH8yed6VE0-9B0dg.text: Always a good choice. Love it that they keep house newspapers around for patrons to read. Have eaten probably everything on the menu. It's all good. And service is always prompt and personable. Only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is the deep fried home fries. Would prefer skillet fried with onions and peppers which are real home fries!

aOjPhQ1jW_XppPCBmAHB5Q.text: Totally surprised that this place has as good of reviews as it does. I don't get it.  Stopped for breakfast because it's right around the corner from our home.   I ordered pork carnitas Benedict. My eggs were over cooked and not runny whatsoever the way eggs Benedict is supposed to be.  The hollandaise sauce tasted canned. I had originally wanted hash browns instead of their "home fries" and when I asked for that the waitress said they're frozen patties "like McDonald's" (her words). Gross, so I went with their diablo potatoes which were seriously those frozen reheated potatoes with their special blend of spices thrown on there. Not fresh whatsoever. I ordered a side of guacamole - wasn't guac - it was mashed up avocado with no additional spices.   My fiance ordered a NY steak and eggs. His eggs were cooked right - but steak was previously frozen and not fresh. Was not medium rare - more like medium well.   The reason I'm giving this 2 stars is because the service was good and the waitress was attentive. Breakfast is not hard to get right, and I'm disappointed. We won't be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Over cooked eggs and reheated potatoes.

FyBFmwPUF1SEsH8BNFi5JQ.text: I LOVE breakfast,  and normally I dont go out for it because its typically too heavy for me. So when I do, it best be delicious and i was not disappointed. Parking lot is shared with a church so I am going to assume that sSundays may be busy.  First off, if you check in, you can get a banana nut muffin for free :)  The Santa Cruz Burrito- a mexican fusion breakfast burrito! The santa cruz sauce is delicious. I felt like i was eating a homemade breakfast chimchanga. Its pretty heavy so I only ate half but I'M SO EXCITED FOR MY LEFTOVERS. 4 eggs+chorizo+CHICKEN. Thats basically triple meat... need i say more? It comes with potatoes  or mexican rice, my server let me get half potatoes and half fruit. I love her. The potatoes are actually like crispy potato blocks and they are seasoned for flavor.  A whole side of it is way too much for me. Highly advise for fruit, because it was delicious. Great way to balance a heavy burrito. 5/5 and would come back to try the cabo burrito. Even my boyfriend loved the burrito. The skillets look amazing, but if youre like my boyfriend and do NOT want a bunch of potatoes, try an omelette or something else instead. The italian skillet was beautiful and delicious, but the potatoes were a little too plentiful. Taste was great and the sunny side up eggs were perfect. Id give it a 3.5/5 because it paled in comparison to my burrito. :P E N J O Y

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Italian Skillet (toast or banana nut muffin on the side)
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Santa Cruz scramble ~$12

05CQXxI6KpftxW3oyP7iwQ.text: As always, having one's own coffee pot is a great plus.  As always, being able to flip the egg when you need something guarantees prompt attention.  Our waitress today was Lisa.  Not sure if we've had her before, but she provided excellent service.  Both breakfasts were very tasty and, as always, enough for two breakfasts:  one day and leftovers tomorrow.    Large parking lot, reasonable prices, excellent service and good food.  Also, the restaurant is large so there is space between tables.  Some local breakfast places (such as New Day Cafe) have crammed as many tables into a smaller space as possible, making it overly warm inside and forcing guests to speak quietly or be overheard.  I love this space.  The restaurant feels spacious.  It is child-friendly.  The train running around the ceiling line is fun.  There is a small "gift shop" at the cash register where you can buy bread, spices and t-shirts.  The patio is pet friendly.  Not sure I'd particularly want to eat outside right next to Eastern Avenue, but if you want to take your dog with you to breakfast, then this is definitely the place for you.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Tomorrow&#39;s breakfast:  Leftover Chili Omelet
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Tomorrow&#39;s breakfast:  Leftover Sundance Omelet
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Healthier options

64bMeOQA81uv7QdIB3yCGA.text: Egg-celent service from Chance! So attentive and personable. The loco moco hit the spot!! Definitely recommend Egg Works!

k8yVB-b-vTAHhzIwBHZIYg.text: My husband and I stopped in for brunch on a busy Saturday. This location is off of Eastern in Henderson.  We waited for about 20 minutes to be seated. We were greeted by a friendly waitress named Patty whom took our beverage order. We chose coffee. She brought our coffee and water out quickly with flavored creamer for me-Hazelnut. Patty checked in a few times with us as we perused their extensive menu of breakfast and lunch offerings. I decided to order lunch, my husband ordered breakfast. Since he is writing a yelp review about his experience, this will be about my overall experience. I ordered the patty melt with seasoned fries and a pickle. Everything was delicious and hot. I think this is the fastest we've ever received our food-cooked to perfection. My patty melt was seasoned and prepared the way I like it. It had a lot yummy Swiss cheese between the rye bread. The fries were seasoned and crispy, the pickle delightful, it crunched when I bit into it.  Patty was delightful, friendly and helpful. She is an excellent waitress. Our hostesses and cashiers were friendly and attentive.  The restaurant was clean and organized. It's well run and the employees work as a team ensuring everyone is served well. I enjoyed my visit and food. I will return soon for breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Patty melt with seasoned fries and a pickle
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Patty melt with seasoned fries and a pickle
Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Menu

1ZeAN7hhJrph8a4dwKyY-w.text: Place is pretty good. Typical diner food def an elder atmosphere tho. Place is big so u can get in Fairly quickly.

Mmx9dd-XA_NKSvbVlEWknA.text: This is my new favorite breakfast spot. Corned beef hash w/ eggs over easy & potatoes's. Went in on a Tuesday morning while my car was being detailed at the car wash near by. The coffee was great as well & the servers were all great once again. So glad I'm less than 2 miles away.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Homemade Corn Beef Hash*, eggs over easy &amp; sour dough toast. Even better than it looks.

TIr3MnYyQ6ZkgTQrhDcMgA.text: I went here for brunch during our most recent Vegas trip and was not disappointed. Food and service is top notch. Facilities and men's bathroom is clean. Price is on par with any brunch/breakfast place. I had the Mexican omelette, which was very flavorful. The eggs were not dry, unlike some chain breakfast places that I have been to. Waitress was on the dot with our coffee refills. Great place for kids, they have a toy train that goes around the dining area and also passes the waiting area. Would return for brunch during our next Vegas trip!

1yMxAh1pIVRGhpbMH0dRmg.text: Great selection! I had a hard time choosing my meal. I ended up with FRENCH toast with eggs and sausage. Was delicious, fresh and well prepared. The coffee was good (but pricey). The little train going around the dining room was adorable too.

i7Pgfozpi-GnPIZdA1w7Hw.text: This place has a nice variety; you can get huevos rancheros, loco moco, eggs Benedict, or just bacon and eggs. Most dishes come with the option of seasoned potatoes which is their house-made cut potatoes with the Egg Works seasoning. I have to warn you; very addicting! My kids had no interest in them at all until I made them try them. Besides the potatoes, we go back for the friendly service. The food is consistent and so is the service which lends to the likeliness in why it's always busy, especially in the mornings on the weekends. Expect a wait of at least 15 minutes. I recommend letting them know if it's your first time, so they can tell you how to get their attention if you need anything! I'm probably here once or twice a month...and I live in Sacramento! :o

sjPSG7b3CT0D7ea74z6cEA.text: We came here for a hearty breakfast before our move today.  It is really close to our new place and we loved the one on sunset.  Tina was a server and she was awesome!  We usually can't finish the whole meal but she told us that we can do half orders of most of the skillets and omelettes.  We had no idea about that and it is a great idea.  The food was delicious as usual and service as I said with Tina was great.  We can't wait to stop here when we don't want to cook.  Planning on asking for Tina every time we come!

UphMWwXX3wu6gCd02uTbtA.text: Their banana nut muffin!!!!!! So moist and warm!   Their country fried steak sauce was delicious. It comes with toast or banana muffin, eggs and potatoes. The potatoes were seasoned really well!   My friends ordered other things (pictured) and were all equally impressed.   The environment was a family oriented restaurant, with trains running around the perimeter of the walls. Service was also quick and friendly.

JW1CjV-9aox1CTxhFbi8Tg.text: UPDATE.. Came back again to this location. On NOV 1... THIS TIME was so much better than my last visit/review. This is why I came back.

vAqAT2E6orGPwIjrQ_vW8w.text: This place is a 100% must. Christian D is an amazing waiter. He brought us samples muffins of their signature banana nut muffins and O. M. G. Their "Habla Diablo" is an exemplary seasoning. Such a great experience and a great way to wrap up our trip to Vegas.

V1v5jtF4i4KtUQmRpQyaaA.text: I've been here before, but PK made my experience the best! the welcomed us and even gave us free banana nut muffins. and if you haven't been here before, you HAVE to get the muffin! he was very informative when it came to the menu. he had even put in our loco moco orders in early because he knew that the patty would take a long time to cook.  overall he was a really amazing server. the food was delicious. make sure you get the banana nut muffin!!

-IMkTzF1GZfXTnIGdDBFrg.text: Egg works is hands down my favorite breakfast spot ever. I've gone to every breakfast place in vegas but nothing compares to my avocado bacon omelette and banana muffin. I also love it because they do half orders which is the perfect portion for me.

pNEdAION2Ta7QlWeyu56Ng.text: It was a solid restaurant. good old fashioned hearty, simple food done well. Service was solid and a good , overall experience.

7_3jnOfJHFeeOJCOtvCUmw.text: We found this hidden gem and have returned almost weekly, great breakfast! They serve healthy items along with an array of delicious entrees, love the whole wheat pancakes.  We have also had wonderful service from PK!, what a kind, conscientious and  fun person to have met. What an asset to your team. We will continue to enjoy breakfast, along with PKs humor.  Thank you

8wgZq7qVsVDzMVNKsutBmw.text: Egg works is one of the best breakfast and yummy cafe restaurants in town! Huge menu and always amazing customer service. Their banana nut muffins are to die for, there is something for everyone on this menu!

JEUlp4lQH9urq4BuJouV7g.text: Our server Jennifer is the best.  She is always upbeat and friendly.  The food and service here is outstanding.

w4mmIiBosJE2YBFf_KlemQ.text: Oh my goodness. The food was amazing. My fiance and I had biscuits and gravy ! So yummy ! The mimosa was so good ! They give you your own mini bottle of champagne and oj , you can put as much (or little ) of oj as you like ! Hubby really loved the sausages ! Manny was our server and he was amazing. So friendly and helpful. We just moved here from Reno, he has been the most friendly encounter since we've arrived ! Egg works is our new breakfast spot !

kU4XDM9m4athcOC7EvKKQQ.text: Save your money and save your taste buds. Easily one of the most over rated places on yelp. Frozen hash browns??? __fTlnnITahOJGVeyXsBKA.text: This place is the bomb.com. Only place worth coming to for breakfast. My family, my kids, and my Boyfriend loves it here just as much as I do. I always get their chili cheese omelette. So fucking delicious. And the staff is friendly and so accomdating with my kids.

yGCp3V8vSVzHWdyeojklag.text: Finally I can get my local breakfast fix! Awesome food and PK served us and he was awesome. Get the island favorites it's amazing.

hGw1S907U1ww2g1FUmo6xw.text: awesome our waiter PK rocks omg he makes the dining experience fun like a comedy show!!   the food rock corn beef hash delicious  always loving it here

NimXgJ27tjlSccUZp91u5g.text: We went here Saturday morning.  Very busy We had Alexa as our server she was great and gave us great service. Like always the food was delicious !!!

Lyv20IrFQ1S_skthBLQMOw.text: This really should be a five star review , but on a hot and busy Sunday it was still warm in the place like the a/c didn't work. But the food was great tasting !! I Had the strawberry texas French toast which was Amazing. My son had a bbq hamburger which he said was just ok, but the onion rings where on point with flavor.

photos.caption: Photo of Egg Works - Henderson, NV, United States. Amazing strawberry French toast!! A must try!!

vVM3E4tFgCMre0DFqSns2A.text: We were a party of 6 this morning.  Mario was our waiter!!!!  Mario was so kind and patient.   We have always had excellent service at Egg Works, but Mario went above and beyond what we expected.  Our glasses were always full, the coffee flowed freely and his chair side manner and humor is fantastic!!

RvtLlW9bOf6ahtBApTgr4w.text: I went to this location on Sunday morning. It was not busy and plenty of employees working. It took 10 minutes for a server to come to our table once we were seated!  Food here is terrible. I ordered a bacon & cheese omelette with their home made banana nut muffin. Choice of DEEP FRIED potatoes of hash brown patties (2) or their DEEP Fried "Works" potatoes. Both are frozen. I chose the hash brown potato.  The muffin came first, it was small and looked to be a cupcake, not a muffin. The muffin was dark brown and black....it was burned and dry. I asked for another muffin that was not burned. The second muffin was the same way. I looked around at other tables and noticed all the people had toast, not the muffin.   The thin omelette arrived. It was burned and the bacon was small pieces of crumble which you could not taste. Sent it back to be made again. Received the same thing back, but it was not burned. The hash brown patty was like McDonalds but it was dense and not good. Not at all like McDonalds.  I gave this one star due to the manager coming over to our table to apologize and telling us she was taking care of the check.  p.s. The manager wanted us to try the Works potatoes.  They were small deep        fried potato pieces with Paprika dusted on them. They were served        cold and they tasted old, like they had been sitting around for a long time.

7nbZbT8YiSkEOzcm49-Fsg.text: First time in here for breakfast and it was pretty good, I got the Chicken Fried Steak (they call it country fried) and it was perfectly cooked, crunchy and hot. The country gravy was the best I've had in a long time. The breakfast potatos were good, but a little plain and skimpy. Everything was seasoned so at least bland flavors were not in their repetoire. Very good service and prompt in everyway. A cup of coffee is $2.75 and they do leave a large decanter full so you never have to ask for refills, but it does kind of boost the check total up a bit. First timers like me may wonder where the menu is, but it is right there under the silverware, disquised as a thin newspaper. There is a wide variety on the menu including Hawaiian breakfast like loco moco and others. The breakfast burrito sounds good and I will have to try that next time. Location is a bit off since it is located way south on Eastern, so if you are coming off the 215 you will probably pass a dozen or more places for breakfast until you reach this location, but they do have a following on the other side of town so this is a welcome addition to the sea of restaurants located on Eastern Ave in Henderson.

1EvNxuYmBiR17pMVTmQmIQ.text: PK is the absolute best at this spot. Ask for him every time you go there you won't regret it. He's friendly, funny, and he's from Hawaii!!! So all you other local Las Vegas Hawaii transplants/visitors... Hit up PK at this Egg Works location. Amazing person and amazing server! Mahalos brada PK!

3bsKWROqOEKTJ9rcElFyZg.text: This is my FAVORITE breakfast spot in the Las Vegas Valley!!!! Great service and EGGcellent food! Ethan, Laura, PK, and Dee are great just like the rest of the staff here. Get the Loco Moco Bruddah! This is my personal favorite! Come to Egg Works and Get EGGactly what you are looking for!! You'll be as EGGstatic as I am!!!! Love this place!!!!!

n5kLkoUIhN8caSYD-1UPQA.text: Stopped in to grab a quick breakfast and was warmly greeted by the hostess.  The attentiveness & customer service provided by PK was incredible.  Loved everything I ordered and will definitely make this a regular stop for breakfast.  Mahalo PK for the wonderful experience.

Hioekp9Yt-MRtJuWxuMwnQ.text: I loved it! Did not have high hopes but it was one of the best breakfasts I've ever had. The flavors were subtle but really tasty. The homemade chorizo was amazing.

f7goe10zB0puHt2uO4bjEg.text: deanna kicked ass!! by far the best and most attentive waitress we have ever had.. give that girl a raise!! thanks deanna for the great service!!

AT8PmuDbNVOke0wDqxdRZQ.text: Just tied this place for the first time. The waitress Jodi was very efficient and great service. Omelets were really good. I had bacon and avocado. HUGE chucks of fresh avocado and lots of melted cheese. Potatoes were good! The banana nut muffin was very tasty.  Hubby had a chicken omelet with avocado, also looked really good.  Prices were reasonable, we will be back!

2SlI90jU4WzDXcLQhe-Xfg.text: Great breakfast place. Manuela was a fantastic server, food is excellent. Have had the traditional Benny and mashed potato omlette and both were exceptional.

54v0ppW1SL5aLRxiX2T8EA.text: Best food in town! Servers and staff are always super nice. If you ever get told there is a ___ wait time. Its totally worth the wait. Their salsas are fabulous as well. Don't forget to take it home with you.

Ttq2gW1JHTqM3FoAueCNQA.text: PK provided exceptional service! He was super friendly and made my birthday breakfast extra special. The food was great too!

-2C9RasATIIp1DyL9iKc_Q.text: Favorite breakfast place in town -- food is always great. There are multiple selections in the menu for every taste. Although staff is always helpful and really fast with the service, I feel the need to single out PK (Paul). I can't say enough about him. He is alone good enough a reason to make this a regular place.

OBqr7CgpESqx32N4rTceOA.text: Good food at  a good price. We  are here 2 x per week. My new favorite is the Key Largo crepe!  PK is a great guy and we always request him!

V6HJoxn4B6VLzHov9rIO_Q.text: This place is a spacious uncrowded but busy restaurant with delicious breakfast. It's definitely a favorite. The staff are also friendly and genuine. Thank you Rob for your great service!!!

M0sc9oum_vXi9645xPEONA.text: I love Egg Works! I come here s couple of times a month. The food is always delicious and fast :) The service is great,  friendly and courteous :) Today our server was Brandt. He recommended some good additions to my meal, was attentive and friendly. All in all, another great experience at Egg Works :)

EiuIR6afy2k4MV8cKOwGPw.text: We noramally dont write reviews but sense we had breakfast last week we have not been able to stop talking about our experiance.  Im sure i could write a book on how great everything was but ill just highlight a few...Our server Randi was just amazing...One in our party wasnt being a bit difficult and indicisive and she did not budge and never dropped that beautiful smile she greeted us with...Not one of us saw the bottoms of our cups, our food arrived timely and was amazing...as i said we had a difficult one with us who weve never seen be happy with any restraunt was blown away with our experiance.  Him bein happy trust me is something i thought id never see. (why i had to take the time to write a review).  Price was right on with the food we recieved.   I wish it was more practical to make this a once a week ritual but we live on the wrong side of town but who knows I think Randi made such an impressoion it might just be.   I highly recommened and hope you have same experiance im sure you will if your fortunate enough to land in Her section.

kw61Nmoawl6qybV1RniVtg.text: The food was good as usual, but our server Paul made the whole experience wonderful. He was so welcoming and got drinks for us as soon as we sat down. He brought my husband and I free muffins for Valentines Day then checked on us often once our meals came. He genuinely seems to enjoy his job which shows in his service. Thank you Paul!

zvKNBU-kQTGLUvg4JWiLow.text: EggWorks Anthem...Great Breakfasts, great service.  Best server ever...PK!  The whole crew is equally awesome.  Love PK, great sense of humor. Breakfast with free entertainment thrown in.

exhtQOwpGDZ-Q-eAIeANsg.text: My husband and I stopped in for breakfast this morning and it was delicious! PK was our server, and he was great. He was very friendly and quick to get us everything we asked for. We would definitely come back if we were in town longer!

fJdojPQ5JaMxq1uQP4KzIw.text: The omelet was perfectly cooked and, even harder to find,  the toast was crunchy.  Thanks to our waitress, Rita, everything was customized just as requested.

wgsjZs9_AU5i88ZVZ0WlIw.text: .We love this place and Kelli is great. The Island Favorite is always fresh.  Portions are perfect
